loans.name: Channy's Group

texts.en:
A villager from Mongkul Borey district of Banteay Meanchey province, Channy is 39 years old and a mother of two school age kids. To overcome her financial burden, her main source of income is a clothing tailoring business. She is working as a paid worker for extra income. 

She has been engaged with this current business for ages, and it has generated a decent income. Now, she is seeking a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and to get the loan she is the leader of a two-member group. She has paid back her past loan with success and it has improved her household to be better than before.

She and her joint borrower are requesting a loan of 1,000,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fabric, thread and a tailoring machine to support her tailoring business. She hopes to improve her lifestyle and to expand her business to a larger scale.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread and a tailoring machine.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Ary

texts.en:
Ary runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits and mobile accessories. He has been running this stall for one year.  Ary lives in Jakarta, an urban area, and is married.

To increase the family income, Ary also works as a dealer.  He joined Ruma one month ago to increase his income and feels really excited to expand his business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments for customers. 

Ary is starting to process electricity bill payments for his customers, which is a much needed service in the area and will increase his income.  To provide this new service, Ary is required to print out receipts for customers.  A Kiva loan will help him purchase this printer and be able to offer the new service.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions using a printer

loans.name: Ning's Group

texts.en:
Ning lives in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Cambodia. She is 24 years old and married with one kid. To make a living, she has been farming rice and working for others for a fee for several years. She can earn about 23,000KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

This is Ning’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She and her group members have been with VisionFund for one cycle. As the leader, Ning wants to use her portion to plow her field. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to plow her field.

loans.name: Samorn's Group

texts.en:
Samorn is 43 years old and married with three children, two of whom are still in school. She is a villager from a rural area located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. Samorn’s family earns a living rice farming and working for others for a fee. She has been in this business for 20 years and can earn about 90,000 KHR per day. Samorn manages to save about 40,000 KHR each day after the expenses. She has been a member of VisionFund for four cycles and wisely and successfully used her first loan to improve her family’s livelihood and relieve their financial burden. 

Samorn is the leader of a group loan request. She will use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. Samorn hopes to grow more healthy rice to increase her family’s income, improve her living conditions, and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Ret's Group

texts.en:
Ret is 37-year-old mother of six children who lives in a rural area located in Battambang province’s Thmor Koul district. She is a farmer in the local area who has been growing cassava for 10 years. 

Ret is the leader of a group loan. This will be her seventh loan with the Kiva partner VisionFund and she will use her portion of the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farmland. Ret hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Chhen's Group

texts.en:
Chhen is a 51-year-old father of four children. He is a villager from Kampong Cham province and the sole source of his family’s income is cassava farming. Chhen has been farming for 26 years and his business generates 18,100 KHR per day. He has borrowed and repaid six previous loans that he used to improve his family’s living conditions.

Chhen is the leader of four-person group loan with the Kiva partner VisionFund. The group is requesting a total loan amount of 6,000,000 KHR. Chhen will use his 2,000,000 KHR portion of their loan to buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor fees. He hopes that his cassava will grows healthy and produce a better yield than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay for labor fees

loans.name: Donatha

texts.en: Donatha is 52 years old. She is a widow with seven children, only two of whom are attending school. She sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past eight years. She has requested a loan to buy more rice, potatoes and sugar for resale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more rice, potatoes and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 27 años de edad vive en casa de su madre con su esposa y su hija,  el se dedica a la venta de peluches y juguetes su forma de vender es en las diferentes ferias que se realizan cerca de su lugar de residencia,  ya que a as ferias llegan muchas personas el logra tener una buena clientela , el cliente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de peluches y juguetes por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 27 years old and lives in his mother's home with his wife and their daughter. He makes a living by selling stuffed animals and toys. He sells them in the various festivals that take place near his home since many people attend the festivals. 

He aims to have a good customer base. He requests a loan to purchase stuffed animals and toys in bulk so that he can continue working, since this is his only source of income. This way, he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase stuffed animals and toys in bulk.

loans.name: Bernardo Antonio

texts.es: Bernardo tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y  sus dos hijas de 17 años y 11 años de edad. Bernardo se dedica a la prestación de servicio de transporte desde hace 30 años. Este negocio y con el apoyo de su compañera de vida le permite mantener la economía del hogar y dar a sus hijas mejores condiciones de vida. Bernardo desea construir un muro de retención para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, grava, arena, piedra, hierro y paga de mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en:
Bernardo is 48 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their two daughters, who are 17 and 11 years old. Bernardo has worked in the transportation business for 30 years. This business, along with his partner's support, allow him to support his household and give his daughters better living conditions.

Bernardo would like to build a retaining wall, so he has requested this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of necessary materials like bricks, cement, gravel, sand, stone, and iron, and also to pay workers to build the wall.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, gravel, sand, stone, and iron, and to pay workers to help him build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Kuy's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Kuy is 53 years old and a mother of nine children. To feed the family, she does cassava farming and grows rice for income. She has been involved with this business for ages and she can earn about 37,200 KHR per day. This is the sixth time borrowing for Kuy and her joint borrower. For her past loans,  she has fully repaid with positive impact for her family as now her living conditions are getting better than before.

 Now, Kuy is seeking a new loan of 1,400,000 KHR and her co-borrower is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 KHR. Kuy is the leader and will spend her entire loan portion to pay for land leasing, plowing, and labor fees. She hopes to increase her family’s income and to expand her business.

loans.use: To pay for land leasing, plowing, and labor fees

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural area located in Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Pov is 35-year-old mother of three children. She has been raising ducks for four years. Having been in the business for four years, she can make a daily income  of 100,000 KHR and is able to save about 30,000 KHR per day  for future needs after expenses.

This is the first loan for Pov with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group of two to ask for a loan.  Pov is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Judith Magdalena

texts.es:
Judith de 33 años de edad,  estudio solo hasta tercer grado, esta acompañada, su esposo trabaja como jornalero agrícola, viven solos y ambos trabajan.

 Judith actualmente tiene una pequeña tienda y vende pupusas los fines de semana con su cuñada, manifiesta que desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar con su familia, antes trabajaba como empleada doméstica en casa de sus vecinos,  también como jornalera en el campo en hortalizas y cañales.

Ahora ya tiene su propio negocio que administra con la ayuda de su compañero de vida, con el préstamo ampliara el inventario de su tienda y comprara más sillas y una mesa para la pupuseria, ya que la demanda es buena y esto le da una excelente oportunidad de trabajo, los planes son primero tener un negocio estable que genere ganancias para comenzar a construir la casa de bloque o ladrillo, actualmente es de lámina.
texts.en:
Judith is 33 years old. She only attended school until third grade. She is married and her husband works as an agricultural laborer. They live together and both work.

Judith currently has a small store and sells pupusas on the weekends with her sister-in-law. She says that she learned to work with her family from a young age. Previously, she worked as a domestic employee in her neighbor's home. She also worked as a laborer in the country on vegetable farms and channels.

She now has her own business that she runs with her partner's help. With the loan, she will expand her store's inventory and purchase more chairs and a table for the pupusa stand. The demand is great and this will provide her with an excellent opportunity. The plan is to first have a stable business that generates income so that she can then build her home with blocks or bricks, since it is currently made of laminate.

loans.use: to expand her store's inventory and purchase chairs and a table for her pupusa stand.

loans.name: Ty's Group

texts.en:
Ty is 33 and a married mother living with her two children in a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Cambodia. She earns a living through farming rice and selling desserts. Ty has been in this business for 15 years and earns about 60,000 KHR per day. She is able to save about 20,000 KHR each day after expenses. Ty has been a member of VisionFund for five previous loan cycles and has completely repaid her past loans. She used her loans to relieve her family’s financial burden and support her business. 

Ty is the leader of group loan request. She will use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. Ty hopes her loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Hidajete

texts.en: Hidajete requested a previous loan to build a little toilet, and she did so. Now she needs help again to make some more repairs to her tiny one-room house. Hidajete says, “It feels so good to have a toilet inside the home, even if that is very tiny. I am so very grateful to all lenders who helped me immensely. I never believed that people who don't even know you, sympathy with you and your situation and help you. I very much thank all.”

loans.use: to make minor repairs to her little one-room house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es:
La Srta. Viviana tiene 23 años y es soltera, vive con su padres, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, ya que por medio de ello podrá ayudar a las personas, que es lo que siempre quiso.
Una de sus aspiraciones es ejercer su profesión en una clínica grande y más adelante tener su propio consultorio y trabajar particularmente.
Pide este préstamo para la inversión en sus cuotas de la universidad, lo que le permitirá seguir estudiando y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Señorita Viviana is 23 years old and is single. She lives with her parents. She is studying nursing, since through this she will be able to help people, which is what she has always wanted.

One of her goals is to practice her profession in a large clinic and later to have her own office and work privately.

She is applying for this loan to invest in her university fees, which will allow her to continue studying and striving to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to pay university bills

loans.name: Soyahotkhon

texts.en:
Soyahotkhon was born in 1972. She is a kind and responsible mother of two children. Her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. 

Soyahotkhon  began her business with selling biscuits. After some years she changed her business. Now, she sells shoes. She has her own selling place in a local market. Soyahotkhon sells women's and children's shoes. She is going to expand the assortment of her shoes for the new season but she has not enough money. She is asking for a loan of 7,000 Somoni to buy women’s and children’s shoes for the new season. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy women’s and children’s shoes for the new season

loans.name: Las Fresitas Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario está coordinado por la señora Karla, mujer trabajadora de 32 años de edad, acompañada y madre de un niño de 3 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva en su comunidad, por este motivo requiere el crédito para la compra de blusas de damas, camisas de caballeros, jean de damas, jean para caballeros, talladores, licras, brazier, y más, con el crédito anterior logró aumentar la mercadería y por ende las ganancias, teniendo como enfoque esta vez aumentar la mercadería para aumentar las ganancias y así hacer mejoras en su hogar, de manera que le ofrecerá a su hijo mejor calidad de vida. Otra de las socias es la señora Rosa de 57 años comerciante de ropa en el extranjero, compra la ropa en el mercado más populo de la capital y lo lleva a vender al país vecino y otra parte en su domicilio, y la señora Elidad de 23 años dedicada a cocer zapatos en el mercado municipal. Es así como estas mujeres luchan cada día para sostener a su familia y que a sus hijos no les haga falta el pan de cada día.
texts.en:
Karla is the coordinator of the support group. She is 32 years old and has a partner and a 3-year-old boy. She makes a living selling new clothing in her local community.

This is why she needs the loan, to buy women's blouses, men's shirts, men's and women's jeans, vest tops, Lycra clothing, bras and other items. With the previous loan she was able to increase her stock and therefore her profits. This time her focus is to increase her stock to increase her profits so she can carry out some home improvements, in order to give her son a better quality of life.

Another of the members is 57-year-old Rosa, who sells clothing in another country. She buys clothing in the largest market in the capital and takes it to sell in a neighbouring country, as well as selling some of it in her home. 23 year old Elidad is also a member and she stitches shoes in the municipal market. This is how these women strive on a daily basis to provide for their families and make sure their children have enough to eat every day.

loans.use: to buy women's blouses, men's shirts, men's and women's jeans, vest tops, Lycra clothing and bras.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Doña Ana vive con su esposo en casa propia sus hijos ya están mayores y viven aparte, es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce, y sale a venderlo por la colonia donde ella reside, su esposo le ayuda en la elaboración del pan, Ana solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su esposo.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband in their own house. Her children are adults and live elsewhere. She is a very responsible, hard-working and honorable woman who works in her own bakery making pastries. She sells them in the neighborhood where they live. Her husband helps making the pastries.

Ana is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of flour, margarine, baking pans and everything needed to be able to produce more. This project to improve her bakery is very important to her as it will improve the quality of living for her and her husband.

loans.use: to buy flour, margarine, baking pans and everything needed.

loans.name: Saodat

texts.en:
Saodat was born in 1971. She is a hardworking woman with a great desire to be successful. Saodat is married and has 2 children. They live in a house in South Tajikistan. 

Saodat is an entrepreneur. For more than 14 years, she has been busy with selling toys. She knows all aspects of her business very well. Her experiences and skills help her to develop business and in this way improve living conditions. She manages her business alone. She wants to develop business further, but her income is small and she needs to your help and mercy. Saodat is asking for a loan of 2,500 Somoni to buy a variety of toys for increasing working capital.

loans.use: To buy a variety of toys for increasing working capital

loans.name: Sandrine

texts.en:
Sandrine is age 31. She is a mother of four children; three of them go to school. 

She has  been selling various items in her boutique for the last 11 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more biscuits, cooking oil, and sugar. 

The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the same business, because the future of the business is very promising.

loans.use: To buy more biscuits, cooking oil and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Nang's Group

texts.en:
Nang, 36, lives with her husband and three children in a rural village of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Cambodia. She has struggled to feed and care her children by farming rice and she has been in the business for 10 years while her husband is a paid worker. Together, they can earn about 37,000 KHR per day and manage to save about 10,000 KHR each day for the future. 

Nang has been with VisionFund for six cycles and she completely paid back the loans. Nang wisely and successfully used the loans from VisionFund to relieve her family’s financial burden. Now Nang is leading her group of two to apply for another loan. She wants to use her portion to build a decent house for her family. She hopes to have a bigger house for her family to live in.

loans.use: to build a decent house for her family

loans.name: In God We Trust Group

texts.en:
Joshua is a 28-year-old man and operates a pork-eating area in the suburbs of Kampala. He is a single man who takes care of his siblings. However, before he started his pork joint, he was selling second-hand clothes in a large popular second-hand clothes market around the city and his business was gutted by fire last year. 

He was very disappointed with the bank where he had acquired a loan because his insurance didn’t repay him for the loss, hence he decided to come to Ugafode micro finance for their credit facilities. He has acquired a loan through the group for the purpose of putting more income into his business of pork selling (he will buy live pigs and slaughter them); this will reduce the expense since slaughtered meat is much more expensive. He will be able to adequately meet his customers' demand and also make more profit. 

His customers are well-wishers and passersby plus neighbors. He is an honest person and God-fearing. He wishes to borrow more money as many times as possible so that he can buy a plot of land and build a small house and reduce the expenses for rent.

The 8th person at the extreme right up is the Ugafode credit officer.

loans.use: To buy pigs that he will slaughter and sell as pork

loans.name: Roy's Group

texts.en:
Roy is a 59-year-old mother of seven children and earns a living through farming rice, while her husband is a paid construction worker to earn extra income for the family. Roy has been in this business for 15 years and the current business earns her about 21,000 KHR per day to feed the family.

Roy has been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely paid back the past loans. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Sandra Malyori

texts.es:
Sandra de 40 años de edad,  no fue a la escuela, está acompañada, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos, su compañero trabaja como jornalero en una ganadería sus hijos viven con ella, uno de ellos trabaja en la agricultura y ganadería. Sandra, solo cuida  y atiende a su familia, a veces realiza algunos trabajos domésticos. 

El préstamo lo necesitara para comprar lamina nueva y ponerla en el techo y también preparara el terreno y comprara algunos insumos para la siembra de maíz, antes que venga la época de lluvias, sueña con que poco a poco ira construyendo la casa y la hará más segura y grande, pues la familia es grande.
texts.en:
Sandra is 40 years old. She didn't attend school. She is in a common-law relationship and has two adult children. She does housework, her husband works as day labor. Her children live with them, one of them works in agriculture and raising livestock. Sandra takes care of the family herself and sometimes does domestic work for others.

Sandra needs the loan to buy new laminate to put in the roof, and prepare the ground and buy some inputs to plant corn before the rainy season arrives. She dreams of building her house little by little making it large and secure as her family is large.

loans.use: to buy laminate for her roof and buy inputs and prepare the land for planting corn.

loans.name: Samnang's Group

texts.en:
Samnang is 41 years old and married, with five children, two of whom are still in school. They live with her family in a rural area of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She has been farming rice for 15 years. The current business earns her about KHR 40,000 per day to support her farmland. 

Samnang has been with VisionFund Cambodia for three cycles. She completely paid back the past loan. Now, she is leading her group to ask for a loan. 

As the leader, Samnang is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to create more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Kujtim

texts.en: Kujtim plans on doing some renovations to their little one-room home. "This year has been very difficult, living in our house; the ceiling was leaking and the cold was coming from the old doors and windows. When it rained, we put some buckets inside our home for the leaking water and stacked some old newspaper underneath and on the sides of windows to keep out the cold. I can't tell you how difficult it was to sleep in it," said Kujtim to the branch assistant who interviewed him.

loans.use: to make some basic renovations to their completely rundown tiny house

loans.name: Sandra Guadalupe

texts.es: Sandra de 43 años de edad, habita en casa propia con sus tres hijos, los dos mayores ya trabajan y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar. Sandra posee un puesto donde reside en el cual vende ricas e higiénicas tortillas. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la venta de tortillas razón por la cual ya es muy conocida en la zona y los clientes la prefieren por brindar un buen servicio y sobre todo higiene y buenos precios en sus tortillas. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora cada día se pregunta cómo puede mejorar sus ingresos para poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Sandra está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal. Tiene mucha Fe que  sus condiciones de vida poco a poco se irán trasformando de manera positiva.
texts.en: Sandra, 43 years old, lives in her own house with her three children. The two older ones already work and help her with the household expenses. Sandra has a stand where she lives in which she sells delicious and hygienic tortillas. She has been selling tortillas for many years, so she is very well-known in the area, and the customers prefer her for providing a good service and above all good hygiene and good prices for her tortillas. She is a fighter and an enterprising woman. Every day she asks herself how she can improve her income in order to give her family a better quality of life. Sandra is requesting a loan to buy wholesale corn and lime. She has great faith that little by little her living conditions will be transformed in a positive way.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn and lime

loans.name: Ana Celia

texts.es: Ana de 56 años de edad  vive con su esposo y su hija. Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene varios años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su  negocio esta ubicado en una zona muy estratégica y frecuentada por las personas de la comunidad, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las mas ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio mas rápido; en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar su inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, cal, etc. Ana tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos y se hace responsable del pago completo de la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Ana, 56 years old, lives with her husband and her daughter. She sells tortillas. She has been doing this work for several years and she has a lot of experience that allows her to obtain the best results. Her business is located in a very strategic area that is frequented by people in the community. She is very well-known since her tortillas are the most delicious and are always hot. She has a lot of customers, and they seek her out for her excellent quality, good prices, and above all fastest service. In these last few months, demand has increased, and she wants to take advantage in order to increase her investment, but she does not have sufficient capital. That is why she is asking for a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy wholesale corn, propane gas, lime, etc. Ana has good payment references from people who know her and she is taking on the responsibility of completely repaying the debt. At the same time she hopes that she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, propane gas, lime, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials: cement, sand, gravel, quarry stone, iron, river stone and wire tie.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda is a widow blessed with two children. She is proud to share that through the income she earned from her sari-sari store, she was able to sustain her children's allowances and send them to school. Now her children have recently finished their college degrees. Yolanda hopes her children will have descent jobs and and a better future. Even though her children have already finished their education, Yolanda still wants to continue to operate her business. She doesn't want to rely on her children for sustenance from their salary if they are hired soon. With this 5000 PHP loan, Yolanda will buy grocery items to sell in her village. She hopes that someday her wish comes true.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 30 years old. He sells goats and bananas. He has spent five years in the business. With the loans, he would like to buy more beers, slaughtered goats and bananas for sale at his pub. He plans to use the profits to put aside more savings. He is very optimistic for his business, for making a better future of his life and for the entire community.

loans.use: To buy more beer, slaughtered goats, and bananas for sale.

loans.name: Yeali

texts.en:
Meet 28-year-old Yealie from Waterloo's western rural in Freetown in Sierra Leone. She is married with three children. 

In 2010, Yealie established her local snacks business. She began her business because she wanted to create income to educate her children. She works at the business from 8:00 am until 5:30 pm, 6 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is sometime purchasing power is very slow.

Yealie requires a loan in order to purchase more cooking oil, fish, cassava and cooking seasonings to expand her business. 

She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. 

In the future, Yealie plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, fish, cassava and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Meet Aminata. She is in her late thirties and from Waterloo Western rural area in Freetown. She is married with 4 children. Her children are currently going to school. 

In 2010, Aminata established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to get her daily living. She works at the business from 7:00 am until 6:00 pm. She says that despite the hardship, her desire is to educate her children.

Aminata requires a loan in order to purchase more cooking oil, tomato paste and cooking seasonings to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to open a savings account and increase her business. In the future, Aminata plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, tomato paste and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Salamatu

texts.en:
Hello, this is Salamatu, a businesswoman from Waterloo in northern Freetown. She is married to a man who works in the local area. They have five children. 

Salamatu started her business to take care of her family. She sells palm oil in a nearby town. Palm oil is heavily relied upon in local homes, as it is the base for spicy local (and affordable) stews, such as ‘crain-crain’ or ‘rice and cassava leaf’. She works from 8.00 am to 6.30 pm, and then tends to her family. 

Even though Salamatu is proud of her business, it faces a challenge from the poor transportation infrastructure in the area. This makes traveling to purchase stock or reach new markets slow and expensive. 

Salamatu would like to use this loan to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon). This would allow her business to remain profitable. 

She would like to thank BRAC Sierra Leone and the Kiva lenders for helping her and her business.

loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon)

loans.name: Chhailim's Group

texts.en:
Chhailim is a local villager from the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province; she is 50 years old. Chhailim is a widowed mother of four children. 

To make a living, she does cassava and rice farming for income. This current business has returned her around 40,000 KHR per day. She has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for the past two loans, with a complete repayment.  It has enabled her to support the family’s business in a timely manner. 

Now she is requesting a new loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she is the leader of the group. She and her co-borrower are requesting loans with the same amount of 1,000,000 KHR each.

As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy seeds and to pay for plowing and labor fees. 

She hopes that her cassava business will prosper more than before so that she can earn extra income.

loans.use: To buy seeds and to pay for plowing and labor fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more cassava grain (foo-foo) to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Michaela

texts.en: Michaela is a hardworking mother of three children. She is 46 years old and is married. Her husband is a carpenter. Due to her desire to help her husband with their children's school needs, Michaela engaged in buying and selling used bottles around their village. Two of her children have already finished college and she is praying that they will be hired immediately. At present, Michaela is still working hard to earn a higher income to achieve her dream of building their own house. Due to a lack of capital, Michaela is requesting a loan of PHP5,000 to buy more used bottles to resell. In the future, she hopes her dream of having a house becomes a reality.

loans.use: to buy more used bottles to resell.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Pilar

texts.es: Mercedes de 55  años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos.  Desde hace varios años  que Mercedes  se dedica al oficio de corte y confección, tiempo en el cual ha ido adquiriendo mucha experiencia como también clientes fijos. Ella es una persona muy responsable, quien trabaja con mucho esmero por dar lo mejor de sí. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en su negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de materia prima como:  telas, botones, hilos, y agujas, para poder atender un pedido grande con el que cuenta y no perder la oportunidad de obtener ganancias extras para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mercedes, 55 years old, lives with her husband and her children. For several years, Mercedes has been a dressmaker, and during this time she has acquired a lot of experience as well as regular customers. She is a very responsible person who works with great care to give the best of herself. She is asking for a loan through which she can invest in her business, buying a greater quantity of raw materials such as fabric, buttons, thread, and needles, in order to be able to take care of a large order she has and not lose the opportunity to earn extra profits in order to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Darajani Group

texts.en:
Christina, who is in her early 50s, is a widow. She has been running a retail shop business for four years now.  She works from 06 am to 3.30 pm daily, and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Christina's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to buy the out-of-stock items in the retail shop.  She has paid back all the loans successfully.  She is happy with the loan. She used the profit to pay for household expenses.  She dreams of making repairs on her house.

Christina will share this loan with her loan group, "Darajani", which has seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase shop inventory.

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is 35 years old. She sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past four years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy sorghum and maize to sell. 

The profits from the business will be used to increase her savings.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum and maize to sell.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca sells clothes and has been in the business for the past year. She has moved from selling juices to clothes, which she expects to have a better return compared to the previous business. 

She has requested the loan to buy more clothes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son's education.

loans.name: Nara

texts.en: Nara lives in Qarakert village with her husband and two daughters. She is a farmer who is raising two cows and three oxen while she also grows cucumbers, tomatoes, and peppers. Nara also has an orchard where she grows different types of fruit trees (apricot, plum, peach, and apple). She is requesting a loan for $1,500 to enlarge her herd with four more oxen. The loan will be a big support for this hardworking woman as she works to develop her farm and earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy four oxen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help pay for her son's education.

loans.name: 2 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
El comité 2 de mayo es de la ciudad de Santaní, están en el séptimo ciclo, donde cada una de ellas está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ayudar a su familia. Ellas son de la zona aun en crecimiento, eminentemente rural.
La señora Eufrosina es integrante de este grupo, ella trabaja en ventas de ropas, y es por medio de su trabajo que quiere poder ayudar a su familia. Su sueño es que su comunidad vaya creciendo y mejorando, donde las personas puedan tener más acceso a la seguridad y también a la educación.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo y mejorando como lo viene haciendo. Todas agradecen por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The “2 de mayo” committee is from the city of Santani and is in its seventh cycle where each of the ladies is putting forth her best effort to help her family.  They are all from a growing rural area.
.
Eufrosina is a member of this group and sells clothing.  She helps her family through this work.  Her dream is for her community to continue improving so that the people will be safer and have better access to education.  She is asking for this loan so she can buy various types of clothing to sell.  In this way she can continue growing and improving as she has been doing.  They are all grateful for the opportunity to improve their lives.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Julio

texts.en:
Julio’s wife is an OFW (Overseas Filipino Worker). They have four children who are studying. Julio doesn’t want to rely only on his wife's remittances, so that’s why he came to a decision to buy a motorcycle for passenger transportation. Sometimes, he also does carpentry work if someone calls for his service, so he can earn a higher income. 

Julio is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy spare parts and fuel for the maintenance of his motorcycle. He hopes to save some of his earnings, so his wife won’t need to go abroad just to sustain their needs.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and fuel for the maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Orzugul

texts.en: Orzugul, who was born in 1960, is a kind woman from a rural area. She is widowed and has three adult children. Orzugul began her own business selling fruits and vegetables in 2008. Orzugul also sells rice, beans, and other products. She has regular customers who always use vegetables and fruits. She manages her business alone. Orzugul is going to increase her working capital and maximize profit. She is asking for a loan of 3000 Somoni to buy fruits and vegetables to sell and increase her working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Agim

texts.en:
Agim wants to add another cow to the herd. With the money that he previously got from lenders, he built a stable for his animals. He appreciates the kindness that lenders showed to him, as per his saying. 

Agim is driven to expand the livestock activity, and he's been taking steps towards his goal. "First I built the stable, and now slowly I will be adding animals," said Agim during the interview.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow with a baby calf.

loans.name: Denis

texts.es:
Existe una mujer llamada Denis, humilde tanto por dentro como por fuera, ella es una persona muy cariñosa, sociable  y muy responsable, ella vivía muy feliz, pero conoció a una persona con la cual se fue a vivir un tiempo, pero no le fue muy bien, ya que esa persona no la trato de la mejor manera y tuvieron muchos problemas, aparte de eso la hermana falleció de una enfermedad muy grave y al poco tiempo se enteró que el esposo le había sido infiel, todos esos problemas hicieron que ella entrara en un estado emocional un poco mal, pero después ella se dio cuenta que tenía dos hermosos hijos que eran lo más hermoso que le había regalado Dios, con el tiempo ella se fue recuperando  y después ella se fue a vivir sola con los dos hijo en un apartamento dejando todo atrás y empezar una nueva vida, después ella conoció una persona que tenía un negocio el cual era muy familiar con la farmacia y es por eso que ella se decide a estudiar servicios farmacéuticos. 

En un futuro ella se ve con el propio negocio, la farmacia propia con los hijos administrándola y así también ayudar a otras personas  con ese sueño. 

Ella necesita del convenio con kiva ya que es una mujer madre soltera con dos hijos y los gastos que ella tiene en el hogar más los hijos no le dejan mucho dinero para que ella pueda ahorrar y pagar las cuotas con el valor normal que ella necesita, si ella le dan el convenio de kiva se puede ahorrar un dinero que puede utilizar en gastos del estudio o que necesite en el hogar.
texts.en:
There is a woman named Denis, who is humble inside and out. She is a very caring person, she is sociable, and she is very responsible. She was living very happily, but she met a person whom she went to live with for a time. However, it did not go well for her because this person did not treat her in the best way and they had many problems. Apart from that, her sister passed away from a very serious disease and a short time later, she learned that her husband had been unfaithful. 

All of these problems led Denis to enter a shaky emotional state, but she then remembered that she has two beautiful children who are the most precious gift God has ever given her. With time, she recovered and she went to live on her own with her children in a new apartment, leaving everything behind and beginning a new life. 

Denis met a person who ran a business very similar to a pharmacy and this made Denis realize that she wanted to study pharmaceutical services. In the future, she can see herself running her own business: a pharmacy of her own that her children can help her manage. She also wants to help other people with this dream. 

She needs a loan from Kiva because she is a single mother with two children and the costs of maintaining her home and supporting her children do not allow her to set aside much money for savings and she does not have enough savings to cover her tuition payments. If she is granted a loan, she can save some of her money, which she can use for tuition costs and home expenses.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's tuition costs

loans.name: Eloa Reche

texts.en:
Eloa is 28 and has always loved fashion. She has worked in offices but always wanted to work with clothing and accessories for the female audience. She has worked in shops, but has the dream of opening her own. 

For some time she has been selling door to door to friends and customers, and everyone relies on her good taste. She went to college for fashion and wants to put her knowledge into practice in her own establishment. 

She rented a place on a busy avenue in the city she believes to be the right spot to make good sales. She has studied the region and believes that the public will be right for the things she wants to sell. She has goods like clothes, shoes, handbags, and jewelry, but needs R$7,000.00 to equip the store, create the facade, buy mannequins, hangers and a security system.

loans.use: to buy mannequins, hangers and a security system.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y maicillo. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 10 años y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Ella es una mujer  trabajadora, responsable y muy conocida en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que ella consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Matilde is 47 years old and lives in her own home with her extended family. She makes her living in agriculture, sowing corn and sorghum. She has worked in this job for the last 10 years and it is how she puts food on the table every day. She is a very hardworking woman, is responsible, and she is well-known in her neighborhood for her enormous heart and her kindness towards others. 

Now that it is almost the season for sowing, she took the decision to begin preparing. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, and more. What she wants most is for her harvest to be abundant and better than the previous years' because this is her livelihood and how she supports her family. She believes that with God's help, her dedication and effort will allow her to achieve her dream of improving the quality of her family's lives.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate, rafters, bolts and pay for labor to build the roof on her house.

loans.name: Hiperbanco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HIPERBANCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
La socia es la Sra. Carmen Rosa, la socia tiene 56 años de edad ,es casada y tiene 04 hijos, La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, la socia trabaja a pedido para todos sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades,familiares,clientes entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia a la vez se dedica a la preparación y venta de refrigerios los cuales de la misma forma distribuye a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar casacas entre otros.
Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “HIPERBANCO” communal bank which is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of the same name.

Rosa is 56 years old, married and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling clothes. She takes orders from her neighbors, family and other customers. She has been in this business a long time and it brings her personal and financial satisfaction. Rosa also makes and sells refreshments and distributes them to the clients that request them. Rosa wishes to continue her work so she can continue to support her family. She is requesting a loan to buy jackets and other things.

The members that appear in the attached photo ask permission to arrive late due to work commitments. The members thank all those involved in making this dream through the loan and promise to pay their installments on time.

loans.use: to buy jackets, etc.

loans.name: Athanasie

texts.en: Athanasie is 39 years old, married and has four children, ages 1 to 12. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, and bananas. She has been in this business for the past three years. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar and bananas for sale.

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
Alvard is engaged in an agricultural business which is the main source of the family's income. She cultivates tomatoes, onions and some grass as well as grows different fruit trees (peach, apricot, cherry, plum, nut and apple).
She works hard to gather a good harvest and sell it in the local markets. But unfortunately, this income is hardly enough for sustaining a family which includes her husband and daughter. Alvard has applied for this loan of USD 3,000 to purchase fertilizer, seeds for cultivation and three pigs. This loan is very important for Alvard to enlarge her agricultural activity and ensure a better life for her family.

loans.use: to pay for three pigs, fertilizer, and seeds for land cultivation

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en:
Meet 38-year-old Memunatu from Waterloo, Western rural area in Freetown. She is married with four children currently attending school. In 2003, she established her vegetable business. She began her business because she wants to generate income to take care of her family. She works at the business from 7 a.m. to 5 p.m. seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is a transportation problem within her operation area.

Memunatu requires a loan to purchase more vegetables, bananas, and coconuts to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her business. In the future, Memunatu plans to expand her business to a higher level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables, bananas, and coconuts to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron, machinery, ink, beams, and advertising materials

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es:
Teodoro de 65 años de edad, no fue a la escuela, tienen 11 hijos todos mayores de edad. Su papá no le dio la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañado, su compañera de vida no trabaja solo se dedica a los oficios domésticos, de sus hijos solo 3 viven con él los otros ya están casados y viven cerca, trabajan la tierra, y fueron poco tiempo a la escuela, solo su compañera de vida depende de él, trabaja como agricultor y jornalero agrícola desde niño con su padre que le enseño a vivir de esta manera,  también cuida una yunta de bueyes él trabaja una parte en tierra propia pero le toca alquilar como 1/14 hectáreas para sembrar maíz y frijol y pastorean los bueyes.


  El préstamo será invertido para comprar fertilizantes y algunos herbicidas y plaguicidas para el manejo del cultivo ya que la mano de obra la pone él y algunos de sus hijos, espera a futuro que la temporada sea buena y las cosechas también, para hacer mejoras a la casa e instalar el agua potable, ya que por ahorrar le toca recogerla de la casa de un hijo que es su vecino.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 65 years old, did not attend to school, and has 11 adult children. His father did not give him the opportunity to study. He is married, and his wife does not work; she takes care of the household. Only three of their children live with them. The other children are already married and live nearby. They farm and went to school for some time. Only his wife is dependent on Teodoro. He has worked as a farmer and farming day laborer since he was a child and worked with his father, who taught Teodoro to live in this way. He also takes care of a pair of oxen. He works part-time on his own land, but he must rent about 1/14 of a hectare to grow corn and beans and to herd his oxen.

This loan will be invested to purchase fertilizers and some herbicides and insecticides to manage his crops since his workforce includes him and some of his children. He hopes in the future that season and the harvest are good. This will allow him to make improvements to his house and install a system for drinking water, since by saving it is his responsibility to clean up the house of his son, who is his neighbor.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and some herbicides and insecticides to manage his crop.

loans.name: Bathany Group

texts.en:
Bethany Group is comprised of four members who are friends and neighbors. They live in the same neighborhood of the city of Accra-Dansoman. The members are friendly, kind, warm-hearted, and charm visitors. They work hard every day to improve their household economies and get their families ahead.

One of the members is Foster, age 32. He is married with two children. Foster sells second-hand clothing and belts. He works seven days without a fixed schedule. The money from the loan will be used to purchase second-hand clothing and belts to expand his merchandise. His goal is to expand his business. 

Foster and colleagues will need a total amount of GHS 6200 to expand their businesses.

loans.use: To purchase second-hand clothing and belts to expand his merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 26 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza de gallina ponedora, comercializa en los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su familia, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollitas y concentrado para poder seguir con su trabajo y  tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This borrower is 26 years old and has been working raising laying hens for a number of years. She sells her products in areas surrounding her home and has many customers. The borrower uses her profits to cover some household costs. She lives with her family in a house that they own. This borrower is applying for a loan in order to buy young hens and fed in order to continue with her business. Together with her family, the borrower wants to enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy young hens and feed.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es: Gustavo de 40 años de edad desde hace muchos años se dedica a cultivar la tierra.  Con mucha dedicación cultiva maíz y frijol, lo cual le permite llevar el  pan de cada día a su hogar. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y responsable. Habita junto a su  grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus cuatro hijos. Junto a su esposa trabajan muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. Con muchos deseos de superación se acerco a esta institución para solicitar crédito ya que la temporada para la siembra comenzó y es necesario iniciar la siembra lo antes posible. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita el crédito ya que necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, fertilizantes, controles de pagas,  etc. para la siembra. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará  tener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en: Gustavo is 40 years old and has been working the land for many years: he grows corn and beans with great dedication, allowing him to bring home his daily bread. Gustavo is hard-working, honest and responsible. He lives with his family, made up of his wife and four children. Gustavo and his wife work very hard in order to help the family to prosper. With a great desire to get ahead, Gustavo has come to "Apoyo Integral" to apply for a loan. The sowing season is beginning and he needs to buy necessary supplies such as seeds, manure, anti-insect chemicals, anti-disease treatments, fertilisers and more. Gustavo trusts in God and in his work that he will have a good yield that will allow him and his family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, anti-insect chemicals, anti-disease treatments, fertilisers and more.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 27 años de edad vive con su familia en casa propia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde siembra está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; La clienta es una mujer activa, entregada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desea realizar una nueva inversión que le permita aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abono, insecticida, herramientas, etc. ella tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: This borrower is 27 years old and lives with her family in a house that they own. She has been making a living growing corn and beans for a number of years and has a lot of experience, allowing her to grow larger harvests. The borrower's land is in an area with a lot of farming, and is very close to her home. She sells her products around the community and has a number of customers who prefer her products because they are of top quality, sold at affordable prices, and the service is good. This borrower is an active woman, and dedicated to her work. She has a great desire to get ahead and wants to invest in her business, allowing her to increase production. To make this investment, the borrower has applied from a loan from "Apoyo Integral". This will allow her to buy seeds, manure, tools, anti-insect chemicals and more. The borrower has a good credit rating and assures us that she will be able to pay off this loan. She is also hopeful that she will bring more financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, tools, anti-insect chemicals and more.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 27 años de edad de  se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 5 años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. Vive en casa propia con su esposa y una hija.  Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, fertilizantes,  etc. y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
This 27-year-old borrower has worked for the last 5 years growing corn and beans. This is how he earns a living and puts food on the table every day for his household. He grows crops every year. He is a very hard-working man and is honest and responsible. He lives in his own house with his wife and a daughter. 

He has decided to ask for a loan to buy the main agricultural supplies: manure, pesticides, seeds, fertilizers etc., and to improve the land where he sows his crops, which is shown in the photo. He hopes to get good results as he does not have any other source of income. He trusts in God that he will be able to get an abundant harvest, which will enable him to keep providing food for his household every day.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides, seeds, fertilizers etc. and improve the land.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Aminata from Waterloo, a western rural area in Freetown. She is married, with four children. Three of her children are currently attending school. 

In 2002, Aminata established her cookery business. She began her business because she wanted to generate income to take care of her family. She works at the business from 4:00am until the food finishes before her rest, seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is transportation problems within her area of operation.

Aminata requires a loan in order to purchase more cooking oil, rice, and cooking seasoning, to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her business. 

In the future, Aminata plans to expand her business to a higher level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice, and cooking seasoning, to expand her business.

loans.name: Asror

texts.ru:
Асрор жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 39 лет. Он женат имеет троих детей. Асрор со своей женой живут счастливо и стараются воспитывать своих детей хорошими людьми, он и его жена очень рады растить своих детей. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Асрор занимается своим любимым делом. Асрор вот уже несколько лет работает трактористом. У него имеется для этого собственный трактор.

Также у Асрора имеется небольшая площадь земли, которую он орошает и сеет на ней некоторую сельхозкультуру. Затем когда собирает урожай, продав этот урожай он получает доход от этого. Но основной доход он получает от работы трактористом. Сейчас он работает на поле так как идёт сезон посева, и много использует трактор. Поэтому ему необходимо закупить топливо для трактора. А для того, чтобы купить топливо, ему не хватает денежных средств. Поэтому Асрор обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку топлива для своего тарктора. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Asror is a cheerful and hardworking man of 39 years. He is married and has three children. Asror and his wife live happily and are trying to bring up their children to be good people. He and his wife are very glad to be raising their children. In order to have income for survival, Asror is engaged in his favorite activity. For a few years now, Asror has been working as a tractor operator. He has his own tractor.

Asror also has a small plot of land, on which he sows and irrigates some crops. Then when he collects the harvest, he sells it and gets an income. But the main income he receives is from operating the tractor. Now, he is working in the field as it is planting season, and he is using the tractor a lot. Therefore, he needs to purchase fuel for the tractor, but he does not have money to buy it. Therefore, Asror applied to Arvand and wants to receive a loan to purchase fuel for his tractor. He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy fuel for tractors

loans.name: Shamsiya

texts.ru: Шамсия жизнерадостная и добрая сельская женщина. В свои 39 лет она уже родила и воспитывает пятерых детей. У нее двое сыновей, которым по 15 и 17 лет, и трое дочерей, которым по 8, 10 и 19 лет. Муж работает вдали от семьи, в чужой стране. Шамсия и ее старший сын занимаются животноводством и растениеводством. В течение 5-6 лет они выращивают сельскохозяйственные культуры и разводят мелкорогатый скот. Шамсия и ее дети любят ухаживать за животными. Сейчас весной везде растет свежая трава - лучший корм для скота. Шамсия в связи с этим хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота. На сумму кредита она хочет закупить несколько ягненок и барашек.
texts.en: Shamsiya is a cheerful and kind rural woman. In her 39 years, she has given birth to and raised five children. She has two sons, who are  15 and 17 years old, and three daughters, who are 8, 10 and 19. Her husband works away from the family in a foreign country. Shamsiya and her elder son raise livestock and crops. Over the course of 5-6 years, they have been growing crops and breeding livestock. Shamsiya and her children like to care for the animals. Now it is springtime and fresh grass is growing everywhere - this is the best livestock feed. Shamsiya, in connection with this, wants to increase her livestock count. With the loan amount, she wants to buy several lambs and young sheep.

loans.use: to purchase lamb and young sheep to increase her livestock count

loans.name: Saboat

texts.ru: Сабоат жительница северной части страны, города Худжанд. Она живет там с мужем, сыном, невесткой и внуком. Сабоат в этом году исполнилось 56 лет и она уже 10 лет как продвигает свой торговый бизнес. Сабоат в своей торговой точке занимается продажей настенных часов, рамок для фото, сувениров, оригинальных бокалов, подарочных коробок и т.д. Сабоат нравится советовать клиентам с выбором подарков. У нее всегда на продаже оригинальные вещи. Сейчас она обратилась за кредитом, так как хочет увеличить ассортимент своего товара. Она надеется таким образом привлечь больше клиентов и увеличить количество продаж.
texts.en: Saboat is a resident of the northern part of the country in the town of Khujand. She lives there with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and grandson. This year, Saboat has reached 56 years and for ten years already she has been promoting her trading business. In her trade stall, Saboat sells clocks, photo frames, souvenirs, original wine glasses, gift boxes, and the like. Saboat likes to give advice to her customers in choosing gifts. She always has original things for sale. Now, she applied for a loan since she wants to increase her assortment of inventory. She hopes in this way to attract more customers and to increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of goods, in particular clocks, souvenirs, photo frames, and other things

loans.name: Reyes Elias

texts.es: Reyes de 48 años de edad desde hace 20 años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maiz y frijol con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar.  El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en:
Reyes is 48 years old. For the past 20 years he has worked in agriculture, which is his primary source of income. He plants corn and beans, and with what he earns from his harvest he is able to cover a few of his household expenses. He lives in his own home with his family members.

He wants to purchase the necessary supplies for his crops such as compost, fertilizers, seeds, herbicides, pesticides and to improve the land he cultivates. This is the land pictured in the photograph. Since Reyes does not have the necessary economic resources to make such an investment, he has decided to request a loan. This is the only way he will be able to continue with his process of cultivation. 

Like any other farmer, he puts his confidence in agriculture because he doesn't have any other source of income and he wants to get ahead by doing the best he can with his crops. He hopes to obtain an abundant harvest which will permit him to repay his loan and to continue providing the daily bread for his family.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizers, seeds, herbicides and pesticides in order to improve his land.

loans.name: Juvelina Del Carmen

texts.es: Juvelina tiene 41 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 14 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tamales de forma ambulante desde hace 16 años. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida Juvelina ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará tejas, madera, clavos y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento dado que no cuenta el capital para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Juvelina is 41 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and her 14-year-old daughter. Juvelina is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who prepares tamales and then sells them by foot. She has been in that business for the past 16 years.

With the goal of improving her living conditions, Juvelina has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the repair of the roof of her home, which has deteriorated. With the loan amount she requested, Juvelina will purchase tiles, wood, nails and iron.

She hopes to be able to count on this financing because she does not have enough money to fund this project herself; but she does have the ability to cover the monthly payments that the loan will require.

loans.use: to purchase tiles, wood, nails and iron to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Ramatu

texts.en:
Meet 31-year-old Ramatu from Waterloo, in the western rural area of Freetown in Sierra Leone. She is married with four children. Some year ago, Ramatu established her retail business. She began her business to earn income for her daily living. She works at the business from 8 a.m. until 5:30 p.m. six days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is a problem with the electricity supply.

Ramatu requires a loan in order to purchase credit cards, movies, plates and generators to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Ramatu plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase credit cards, movies, plates and generators to expand her business

loans.name: Sagif

texts.en: Sagif is 51 years old. He was married and has two children. His 22-year-old son is studying his fourth course at university and his 18-year-old daughter is studying her third course at music college. All of the family are IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons); their original home was in the city of Khojaly and now they live in the Baku region. Sagif is a master mason; he builds stone walls for houses. He has been in this business for 12 years. Today Sagif needs a 1,200 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) loan to buy new materials for his business. He is thankful to Kiva for this help. In the future, he wants to hire an assistant to help support his business.

loans.use: to buy new materials for his business.

loans.name: Raed

texts.en:
Raed is a 28-year-old married man from Deir el Balah. He is a father of one small son. One year ago, Raed started his own project which is raising sheep. It is a good business and earns a good income. Raed would like to improve his business and expand it. 

Raed took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more sheep for his farm. By taking this loan, Raed's productivity of milk and dairy products will increase. 

Raed appears in the photo in his farm.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 22 años de edad vive junto a su familia en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y  frijol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, el cliente se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, el cliente solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL donde le permita comprar semilla, control de plagas, abonos, fertilizante, etc. el cliente  tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: This borrower is 22 years old. He lives with his family in their own house. He grows corn and beans. He has many years of working in agriculture, and so he has had a lot of experience in this area. He is well know in the zone, and he already has a good customer base, since he obtains the best harvests. Consequently he sells products of first quality and at very affordable prices, along with unequaled service. The borrower is known for his great friendliness. He is an entrepreneurial man with a great will to advance. He is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, pest controls, compost, fertilizer, etc. He has references of having impeccable morals, being responsible, and having a good payment record. He is confident that he will be able to be responsible for the debt and at the same time he will be able to give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pest controls, compost, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Jose Pascual

texts.es: Jose de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 5 años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados de granos básicos, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Jose solicita un crédito para poder mejorar el terreno donde piensa hacer su siembra y comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y así el pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Jose is 46 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their five children. For the past five years he has farmed corn and beans, and this has given him the necessary experience to tend to his crops. He sells his harvests in the markets where they sell basic staples, and he is able to cover his household expenses with the earnings from his sales.

He requests a loan to improve the land which he plans to cultivate, and to purchase the necessary supplies to do so, such as fertilizers, compost, herbicides and other things. With this he will have better harvests, through which he will earn more and improve the economic stability of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, compost and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost, poisons for pests, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: Florencia se dedica a la venta de comestibles como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, tarros de leche, aceite y fideos, ella una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Señor de Coyllority” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Florencia makes a living selling groceries such as bags of rice, sugar, jugs of milk, oil, and noodles. She a responsible person, which is why she was invited to be a part of the "Señor de Coyllority" community bank. At this time she needs a loan to buy merchandise such as bags of rice and sugar. She appreciates and values the loan, and promises to make her monthly payments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bags of rice and sugar.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is 39 years old. She is married and has four children. She sells various items in her shop. With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, rice, and maize flour for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, rice, and maize flour for resale.

loans.name: Micheline

texts.en: Micheline is 33 years old. She is married and has three children. She sells cooking oil and biscuits and has been in the business for the past eight years. With the loan, she would like to buy more bananas and biscuits for resale. The profits from the business will be used for making more savings.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and biscuits for resale.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en: Solange is 31 years old. She is a mother of three children aged between four and eight and they all go to school. With the loan, she would like to buy more beers and sodas for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: to buy more types of beer and soda for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon)

loans.name: Varduhi

texts.en:
Varduhi lives in Ararat town with her husband and two daughters. She is a teacher with many years of experience teaching at a local school. Besides her work at school, Varduhi also runs a farm. She cultivates tomatoes and peppers and sells the gathered harvest in the local open markets. 

Varduhi is very enthusiastic about developing her farm so she has applied for this loan. The loan of USD 3000 will help her to purchase two oxen, fertilizer, and hire workforce for land cultivation.

Additional income would greatly assist the family so Varduhi will be very grateful to lenders for their support.

loans.use: to pay for two oxen, fertilizer, and pay for workforce for land cultivation

loans.name: Sona

texts.en:
Sona and her mother live in Vanashen village of Ararat region. Despite her young age, Sona has many years of experience in the agricultural field. She learned how to keep a grape orchard when she was little girl. And now, she is grown up and helps her mother with their farming business. 

The reason why Sona is asking for this loan of USD 3000 is to purchase supplies for their orchard. The loan will be a big support for Sona to prepare for the new cultivation season with a newly renovated orchard.

loans.use: to pay for farming supplies for grape vineyard (wires)

loans.name: Medardo Ruben
