texts.es: Medardo de 57 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive con su esposa y sus 5 hijos, Medardo esta solicitando un credito para poder comparar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y poder darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: Medardo is 57 years old and has worked in agriculture for several years, and that has given him the capacity and knowledge necessary to tend his  crops. His main sown land is corn, he sells his crops in grain stores close to his home. With the earnings from his sales he achieves covering some household costs, he lives with his wife and five children. Medardo is requesting a loan to be able to buy agriculture inputs that help him in sowing his crops like compost, seeds, fertilizers. In this way, he'll be able to have higher earninging and give his family better economic stability without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Hassanatu

texts.en:
Meet 28-year-old Hassanatu from Waterloo Western rural in Freetown in Sierra Leone. She is married with two children. In 2007, Hassanatu established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to empower herself. She works at the business from 8:00 am until 5:30 pm, 6 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is sometimes purchasing power is very low.

Hassanatu requires a loan in order to purchase more bagged flour, bagged sugar and cooking oil to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Hassanatu plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more bagged flour, bagged sugar and cooking oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, fish, palm oil and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Shedo

texts.en:
Shedo is a 43-year-old married woman. She deals in a business selling cloth in her locality.  She buys cloth, different fabrics in various colors and designs, from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

Shedo is requesting a 50,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gallons of palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Shaysta

texts.en:
Shaysta, age 39, is a married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

Shaysta needs to improve her business to cover her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is on her third loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: Adrian de 53 años de edad, vive con su esposa en casa propia lugar en el cual posee su propia granja de cerdos en la cual se dedica a comprar cerdos tiernos los cuales cría y posteriormente comercializa, Adrian es una persona muy responsable y trabajador. Desde hace 10 años que él se dedica a este trabajo, el cual ha ido creciendo poco a poco, a pesar de esto él cuenta con una cantidad de clientes muy aceptable, por lo que desea contar con mayor cantidad de cerdos para extender aún más su negocio, es por esto que él solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir comprando: concentrado para cerdos, vitaminas, y así mismo mejorar el lugar en el cual habitan sus crías, de manera que el estándar de calidad sea aún más alto y así brindar un mejor servicio, el cual le permita mejorar sus ganancias y tener junto con su esposa una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Adrian is 53 years old and lives with his wife in their own home where he owns a pig farm. He makes a living buying and breeding pigs to sell. Adrian is a very responsible and hardworking person. He has been running this business for 10 years, which has been gradually growing. 

He has a good amount of customers, but he wants to have more pigs to further expand his business. This is why he is requesting a loan which he will invest in: buying pig feed and vitamins, and improving the place where the baby pigs live, so that the quality is even higher and he can provide better service, which can lead to higher income and better quality of life for him and his wife.

loans.use: to buy pig feed, vitamins, and improve his pig farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stones, cement, gravel, sand and wires, and pay for the labor needed to fix her walls.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam lives in Nor Ughi village with her husband. Their only son is a migrant worker in a neighboring country who financially supports the family from time to time.

The main source of family's income is agriculture. Mariam keeps only five chickens and mainly is involved in land cultivation. Mariam cultivates tomatoes and peppers, as well as growing a large variety of fruit trees (e.g., apricot, peach, plum, nut, and apple). 

Mariam has now applied for this loan of USD 2,500 to be able to purchase fertilizer and hire workers for land cultivation. As the new cultivation season starts, it is very important for Mariam and her husband to hire workers who will support them with the cultivation process. 

Mariam hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and to hire workers for land cultivation.

location.town: Nor Ughi village of Ararat region

loans.name: Firuza

texts.en: Firuza was born in 1966. She is a kind woman and a careful mother of four children. She has been a widow for some years, and she is the main breadwinner of the family. Firuza is highly educated. She was a teacher, but now she doesn’t work in a school because the salary is small. She has been busy selling a variety of fabrics more than 14 years. She sells fabrics in a local market where she has a stall. Firuza is going to increase her working capital, but she has no money. She is asking for a loan of 2500 USD to buy fabrics. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Savin's Group

texts.en: Aged 43 and a villager in Kampong Cham province, Savin is a mother of three kids. Her main source of income is cassava farming, which she has done for 23 years. She can earn extra income via rice farming. This business has generated her about 25,000 KHR per day. This is Savin's fourth loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she is the leader of a group consisting of three members. She and her joint borrowers are requesting a loan of 3,700,000 KHR, of which 1,500,000 KHR is her loan portion. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay for labor and plowing fees for her farmland. She hopes to upgrade her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay for labor and plowing fees

loans.name: Aura Jenny

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Narcisa Del Jesús se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Aura, tiene 35 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 12 y 3  años, la mayor estudia en colegio. El marido es ebanista. 
Doña Aura es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, ella también le da parte del crédito para que su marido lo utilice en su taller de ebanistería en el cual él trabaja y elabora todo tipo de muebles con la madera, así el sale adelante y ella también en sus 5 años que lleva en su negocio.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, bisutería y madera para los muebles. Lleva más de 5 años en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Narcisa del Jesús” meets fortnightly in the Jipijapa canton, also known as “sultana del café” [coffee’s sultana] thanks to its vast coffee plantations and its coffee’s unrivalled taste, its gastronomy and the warmth of its people. This is where Aura lives. She is 35 and lives in a common-law marriage. She has two children who are 12 and 3. The eldest goes to school and her husband is a cabinetmaker.

Aura works as a housewife. In order to generate her own income and help her husband with the home expenses, she started selling products from Avon and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women). She works three days a week, between two and three hours. She sells on credit and collects every week. She gives some of her income to her husband so that he can use it in his workshop, where he makes all kinds of wooden furniture. This way, he gets ahead with his business, which he has had for five years.

With this loan, Aura will buy perfumes, creams, accessories and wood to make furniture. She has been a member of the communal bank for more than five years. She says she likes it because thanks to the group, she was able to start her business. Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, accessories and wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Natavidad Rosa

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Narcisa Del Jesús se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Natividad, tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  28, 20 y 13  años,  la menor estudia en colegio y es quien aun vive con ellos. Su esposo es maestro constructor.
Doña Natividad con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos desde hace ya 12 años instalo un pequeño bazar en el centro de la ciudad en un local que arrienda,  en el trabaja durante todo el día vendiendo ropa, zapatos, bisuterías, entre muchos otros artículos de bazar, ella siempre utiliza los créditos para mejorar su negocio es por eso que este crédito lo espera utilizar para comprar pañales y surtir una pañalera y así  tener mejores ingresos ya que estos son productos que se venden mucho y a diario, su hija después de clases se va al negocio a ayudarle y darle su compañía.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar pañales para así empezar a vender estos productos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 18 años  y le gusta por con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños es tener un local propio ya que el arriendo se le lleva gran parte de sus ganancias.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Narcisa del Jesús” meets fortnightly in the Jipijapa canton, also known as “sultana del café” [coffee’s sultana] thanks to its vast coffee plantations and its coffee’s unrivalled taste, its gastronomy and the warmth of its people.  This is where Natividad, 47, lives. She is married and has three children aged 28, 20 and 13. The youngest one goes to school and her husband is a general contractor.

Natividad wanted to generate her own income, so she opened a small store in the city center twelve years ago. She rents the establishment and works the whole day selling clothes, shoes, accessories and many other items. She uses these loans to improve her store, and this time she will use it to buy diapers to sell and in this way increase her income. These products are very popular and their sales are good. Her daughter comes after school to help her and keep her company.

She has been a member of this group for eighteen years and likes it because she started her business with one of these loans. Her dream is to have her own establishment, considering that the rent represents a big share of her income.

loans.use: to buy diapers to sell.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en: Narine is a young farmer from the village of Aragats in the Armavir region. She helps her family run their farm. They cultivate cabbages, cucumbers and greens and sell their harvest at local markets. The family is hardworking. Narine applied for this loan of USD3,000 to be able to purchase the supplies needed to renovate their greenhouse (polyethylene cover, wires) as well as seeds and fertilizer for land cultivation. The loan will be a big help to the whole family, allowing them to expand their farming business and hopefully improve their living conditions. Narine and her family members are hoping for your support.

loans.use: to pay for supplies to renovate her greenhouse (polyethylene cover, wires) and purchase seeds and fertilizer for land cultivation.

loans.name: Taaj

texts.en: Taaj is 30 years old, married and has been running a business selling milk for many years.  She has two cows in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. She looks after the cattle and performs the task of collecting milk from them while her husband sells it in different places on a daily basis. They are happily doing it together to support their family. She is a mother of three children. She is very motivated to provide a beautiful life for them with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. It’s her third year with Kashf Foundation and she is happily running her business through their support. Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more cow. She hopes to get an increase in her sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Zatoon

texts.en: Zatoon is a 54-year-old married woman.  She has been doing a business selling bangles for many years. She buys bangles from the wholesale markets at lower rates and then sells them to the people of her community at a profit. Her husband’s income is not enough to fulfill the family's needs. Therefore, she started her own business to contribute to the family income. Zatoon has requested a loan of PKR 60,000 to buy the latest variety of bangles in different colors and sizes. This will help her to increase her sales. She is in her seventh loan cycle with a good repayment history. She wants to expand her business to provide a better standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy the latest variety of bangles in different colors and sizes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sugar, milk and biscuits

loans.name: Lucilene Ramona

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Narcisa Del Jesús se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 
En este lugar vive la señora Lucilene, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 16, 9 y 6  años de edad, la mayor estudia en colegio y los menores en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa local.
Doña Lucilene para poder ayudarle a sus esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que con lo que él hace no alcanza para cubrir los gastos hace varios años empezó un negocio, ella tiene un pequeño comedor en su casa en el cual prepara desayunos, almuerzos, meriendas y platos a la carta, trabaja todos los días con la ayuda de sus hija y una sobrina a quien le paga un sueldo mensual por su trabajo. Tiene su comedor por mas de 9 años y siempre le ha ido muy bien ya que sus clientes la prefieren por la sazón que le pone a sus platos lo que la hace especial.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 5años  y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le dan los créditos. Sus sueños son darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The credit group Narcisa Del Jesús meets every two weeks in the Jipijapa canton, which is known as the sultan of coffee for the extensive coffee crops which have an incomparable flavor.  It is also known for its cuisine and the warmth of its people.

Lucilene lives in this place.  She is 40 years old, married, and has three children who are 16, 9, and 6 years old.  The oldest is in high school and the youngest are in primary school.  Her husband works at a local business.  In order to help her husband with the household expenses, since his work was not enough to cover their expenses, she started a business many years ago.  She has a small restaurant in her home where she prepares breakfast, lunch, snacks, and main dishes.  She works every day with the help of her daughter and a niece who she pays a monthly salary.  She has had her business for more than nine years and it has always gone very well since her customers prefer the seasoning she puts in her dishes, which she makes specially.  

She will use this loan to purchase rice, meat, fish, and other food items to prepare her dishes.  She has been in the credit group for five years and likes it for the help that the loans provide.  Her dream is to give her children a good education.

loans.use: to purchase rice, meat, fish, and other food items.

loans.name: Esmeralda Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESMERALDA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Achacachi, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Victoria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: pesca, venta de cerveza, venta de ropa.
 
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Victoria es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un asesor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de pesca; da a conocer que este negocio fue un negocio familiar y que al empezar a convivir con su pareja deciden seguir realizando el mismo negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de redes de pesca) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo instalará en los mismos espacios de pesca. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le el crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Esmeralda" will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer (Pro Woman). Located in the city center of Achacachi, the group is made up of 8 people and directed by a board of which Victoria is the President.  The businesses pursued by the women in the communal bank are varied, including fishing, selling beer, and selling clothing. 

The loan requested will be used to benefit micro-business owners in the group of which Victoria forms a part.  She notes that this is the first time she has been part of a communal bank.  She joined based on the invitation of a counselor from the bank who visited her in her home.  Currently she has a small fishing business.  She let us know that this was a family business and that when she began living with her partner they decided to work together in this same business. 

She will use the loan to increase capital (to purchase nets for fishing) which she will buy from salespeople in the city of El Alto and later install in her fishing locations.  This form of work allows her to generate income in order to support her family, since she lives with her partner and has three children.  
 
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the loans offered by the institution.

loans.use: To purchase nets for fishing.

loans.name: Obaida

texts.en:
Obaida is a 24-year-old single lady from Gaza city. She lives with her family in a very humble house. Her father works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs. Obaida is a student in a local university where she studies technology devices. She would like to finish her studies and take a BA degree so she can find a good job in the future.
 
Obaida took a Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking this loan, Obaida will be able to do her homework using advanced programs. 

Obaida appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda se dedica a la venta de celulares y tiene una pequeña tienda donde expende su mercadería por el momento otras persona administra el negocio pero en sus horas libre la encontramos vendiendo, ella también es profesora y enseña en uno de los colegio de la zona y le va muy bien, ella sigue  siendo parte del banco comunal “Señor de Coyllority” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar accesorios como audífonos, baterías, estuches y otras cosas más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Hilda works selling cell phones, and she has a small store where she sells her merchandise.  At the moment, she has other people running the business, but in her free time she can be found there selling.  She is also a teacher and she teaches in one of the high schools in the area, which has been going very well for her.  She is a part of the "Señor de Coyllority" communal bank.

She is seeking this loan to purchase accessories such as headphones, batteries, cases, etc.  She is grateful for and values the loan.  She is committed to complying with the repayment schedule responsibly.

loans.use: purchase accessories such as headphones, batteries, cases, etc.

loans.name: Sergio Osvaldo

texts.es: Sergio de 31  años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 7 años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y asi poder tener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sergio is 31 years old and he has worked in agriculture for the past 7 years, which has given him the skills and knowledge needed to care for his crops. His primary crop is corn.  He sells his harvests to agencies that buy and sell basic grains.  The agencies are located near his home.  With his earnings he is able to cover some of his household expenses. He lives in a house that he owns with his family.

He is seeking a loan to purchase agricultural supplies that will help him plant his crops such as: manure, seeds, and fertilizers.  This will allow him to improve his earnings so that he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase manure, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia se dedica a la venta  de comestibles y participando a uno de los bancos comunales, ella en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, fideos, detergente, gaseosas y se  compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Silvia works selling food, and she also belong to one of the communal banks.  She is seeking a loan to purchase merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, detergent, and soda.  She is committed to complying with the repayment schedule responsibly.

loans.use: purchase merchandise such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, noodles, detergent, and soda.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa María dio sus primeros pasos al comercio ofreciendo deliciosos nacatamales a los visitantes del mercado de la ciudad Granada, sin embargo, debido a la fuerte competencia que existía, optó por finalizar ese negocio y empezar uno nuevo, que es la venta de frutas en la acera de la Alcaldía Municipal, cerca del parque central.  Su puesto se encuentra ubicado en un excelente punto, ya que el área es bien transitada por turistas nacionales y extranjeros. 
Las frutas que ofrece llaman la atención de los turistas porque están frescas, jugosas e higiénicas. Rosa solicita un préstamo en KIVA MiCrédito, para la compra de una mayor cantidad  de productos naturales (frutas como melón, sandía, banano, papaya). Estimando que el crédito a solicitud le ayudara a que su  negocio crezca, de igual forma que sus ventas aumenten  y ganancias serán utilizadas para la formación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosa María took her first steps in the business world by selling delicious tamales to the visitors of the Granada market.  However, due to the strong competition that existed, she decided to close that business and start a new one, which is selling fruit on the sidewalk of city hall near the central park.  Her stall is located in a great spot as the area is well visited by domestic and foreign tourists.  The fruits that she sells attracts the tourists because they are fresh, juicy and clean.  

Rosa is seeking a loan from Kiva to purchase a large quantity of natural products (fruit such as: melon, watermelon, bananas, papayas). She believes that the requested amount will help her to grow her business by increasing her sales and earnings, which she will use to raise her children.

loans.use: Purchase a large quantity of natural products (fruit such as: melon, watermelon, bananas, papaya).

loans.name: Farah

texts.en: Farah is a 32-year-old vigorous married lady. She has been running a tailoring business with her husband (also shown in the photo). She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. Her husband also knows the techniques of stitching. By this time, they have become famous in their locality and count a good client list.  However, due to lack of availability of funds, Farah requested a loan of 40,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of threads in different colors and packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so they are able to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her third loan cycle and has shown a good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors and packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Stefany Group

texts.es:
Con el objetivo de buscar alternativas de financiamiento mediante crédito en Pana Pana, para mejorar sus negocios e ingresos, que les permitan mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias, para poder cubrir necesidades básicas de alimentación, educación y vivienda, se integraron 3 mujeres luchadoras, para conformar el grupo solidario Stefany, cuyo nombre alude al segundo nombre de la coordinadora del grupo la señora Tania.

Tania Teffany: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada, tiene 2 hijos, en edad escolar. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal. Hace 3 años estableció su propio salón de belleza, ubicado en un lugar donde transita mucha gente, lo cual le permite tener buena clientela con los servicios que ofrece de peinados, cortes de cabello para hombres y mujeres, alisados, planchados, pistoleado, maquillaje, entre otros. Gracias a las ganancias percibidas le han permitido contratar a dos ayudantas, cuyo salario mensual aproximado es de C$ 3,000. Solicita su primer financiamiento en PANA PANA, con el propósito de comprar mercadería e insumos para su negocio: pinturas de uñas, shampoo, maquillaje y tintes. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y dedicarse también a la comercialización de mariscos.

Mary Jane: Es originaria de Puerto Cabezas, es soltera. Desde hace 2 años vende en su vivienda perfumes y cosméticos por catálogo. Solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar mercadería en Managua y venderla a precios accesibles. Su sueño es establecer una pulpería en el mercado municipal.

Olga María: Desde hace 8 años vende de manera ambulante ropa usada, tiene 2 hijos, de 10 años, que cursa su quinto grado de primaria y una pequeña de 2 años de edad Solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar una paca de ropa mixta. Más productos para su pulpería. Su sueño es establecer una tienda de ropa de nueva.
texts.en:
In order to seek alternative financing with a loan from Pana Pana and to improve their businesses and incomes, which will allow them to improve their families' living conditions and to cover basic necessities including food, education, and housing, three hardworking women formed the solidarity group Stefany.  The name of the group alludes to the second name of the group's coordinator, Tania.  

Tania Teffany is originally from Puerto Cabezas.  She is 28 years old, married, and has two school aged children.  Her husband works informally.  Three years ago, she started her own beauty salon.  It is located in a high traffic area, which allows her to have many customers.  She offers services including hairstyles, women's and men's haircuts, smoothing, flat ironing, blow drying hair straight, makeup, and others.  Her profits have allowed her to hire two assistants, whose monthly salary is approximately C$ 3,000.  She is requesting her first loan from Pana Pana to purchase merchandise and supplies for her business: nail polish, shampoo, makeup, and dyes.  Her dream is to expand her business and also start selling seafood.  

Mary Jane is originally from Puerto Cabezas.  She is single.  She has worked for two years selling perfumes and cosmetics by catalog from her home.  She is requesting her first loan to purchase merchandise in Managua and sell it at affordable prices.  Her dream is to open a grocery store in the town market.  

Olga María has worked for eight years as a street vendor selling used clothing.  She has two children, one is 10 and in the fifth year of primary school, and the other is 2 years old.  She is requesting her first loan to purchase a bundle of used clothing. Her dream is to open a store selling new clothing.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and supplies for her business: nail polish, shampoo, makeup, and dyes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase mototaxi parts.

loans.name: Adel

texts.en: Adel is a 23-year-old single man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a very humble house. His father works as an employee in the public sector; his low income is barely enough to cover all of the family's needs. Adel is a student at the local university where he studies Arabic literature. He would like to finish his studies and earn a BA degree so he can find a good job in the future. Adel took out a Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy a new laptop for his studies. This will help Adel to do his homework and prepare essays. Adel appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.en:
Gavhar is 36 years old and lives in a small village with her children. Her husband is a migrant worker in Russia.

The main source of income for the family comes from her milk cows. She works hard selling milk, kefir and sour cream to the local population, but her profits are hardly enough to provide food for the family.

Gavhar wants to increase her income doing what she knows best, but she hasn’t enough money to buy more cows. So she is now applying for a 7,000 TJS loan through CSC MDO. This loan will help her to buy more cows and subsequently improve the family’s living conditions. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy more cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more vegetable and garden seeds to expand her business.

loans.name: Gloriya

texts.en:
Gloriya is a 42-year-old, married woman. From the past six years, she has been selling spices which are used in cooking, for taste. She purchases spices in bulk from a wholesale market and then sells them in packs of various sizes. She has become famous by providing good quality spices in her locality and earns enough to afford a decent life. She is a responsible mother of five children and needs to earn more money to bear the daily expenditures of her family members. 

For this reason, Gloriya requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy stocks in large quantity of salt, red chiles, black pepper, and turmeric. She is in her third loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize her earned profit on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy stocks in large quantity of salt, red chiles, black pepper, and turmeric.

loans.name: Khuramovi

texts.ru: Хурамови 51 летняя жительница района Шахритус. В Шахритусе большинство жителей занимаются сельскохозяйственными деятельностями, но Хурамови выбрала деятельность в иной сфере. Она занимается продажей мужской одежды  на рынке района. Ей помогает ее сын. У Хурамови дружная семья. Ее муж скончался, и Хурамови одна вырастила сын. Сейчас она ее сын, невестка и внук дружно живут в одном доме. Основной источник дохода приносит Хурамови. На данный момент ей необходимо привести новый товар для нового сезона, но у нее не хватает достаточной суммы денег. По этой причине она обратилась за помощью.
texts.en: Khuramovi is a 51 year old woman from Shahrituz.  Most of the residents of Shahrituz work in farming, but Khuramovi decided to work in a different field.  With the help of her son, she sells female clothing at the market.  Khuramovi has a very close family; her husband passed away, and she has one grown son.  She and her son, daughter-in-law, and grandson live together in the same house.  Khuramovi's work is the major source of income for the family, and she needs to purchase products for the new season.  She lacks sufficient funds, however, and for this reason, has turned for help.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing for the new season

loans.name: Blanca Maricela

texts.es: Blanca tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida. Blanca se gana la vida por medio de la venta de ropa usada en las diferentes zonas de su localidad. Blanca es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y responsable. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para la reparación de una habitación. Con el monto solicitado comprará: cemento, arena, lámina galvanizada,madera y pagará la mano de obra necesaria.
texts.en: Blanca is 27 years old and lives at home with her life partner. She makes a living selling used clothing in different areas of her city. Blanca is an enterprising, hardworking, and responsible woman. With the desire to improve her living conditions, she has made ​​the decision to apply for this loan through FUSAI to invest in the purchase of materials needed for the repair of a room. With the amount requested she can buy: cement, sand, galvanized steel, and wood, as well as pay the necessary labor costs.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, galvanized steel, and wood, as well as pay for labor costs to repair a room.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred has a carpentry shop and he wants to buy a part of the current equipment; this loan will help him to achieve his goal. He makes kitchen cabinets, doors, windows, bed frames, etc., and he has been able to build a good clientele throughout these past eight years of practicing his profession that he inherited from his father. As he says, Alfred wants to do the same thing, bequeath it to his twin sons. 

Alfred is a 30-year-old married father of 3-year-old twins.  He and his family had lived in a more rural region before where residents experienced a lack of electricity, paved roads, and transportation means in addition to the very cold weather that kept the snow on for almost nine months. Upon arriving in this current location, his father and he opened up their carpentry shop. According to them, their decision to relocate has been a good one.

loans.use: to buy some equipment for his carpentry shop

loans.name: Yasmin

texts.en: Yasmin is 50 years old, married, and has four children. She is very talented and excels in making envelopes. She makes a large quantity of envelopes at home and sells them at the local market. Her husband's income is not sufficient to meet the family expenditures alone so her income helps in providing for the household activities. To help her continue operations of her business, Yasmin is requesting a loan of 40,000 PKR, which she will use to buy bundles of good quality paper and some glue to increase her sales. She expects an increase in her business income as she expands. She wishes to spend part of the revenues on providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy bundles of good quality paper and some glue.

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en: Balqees is a 45-year-old married woman. Fifteen years ago, she started her business stitching clothes to contribute to the family income. She is well familiar with stitching techniques. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. She has now requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more reels of thread and packs of buttons, zippers and lace in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Balqees hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living for her family members.  She is in her fifth loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread and packs of buttons, zippers and lace in various colors.

loans.name: Haseena

texts.en:
Haseena, 56, is married and has three children. She is motivated to provide her family with good-quality food, clothing and healthcare.

With her son’s help, Haseena has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. He helps by dealing with wholesalers and buying stocks of goods from them.

Haseena wants to grow her business, so she is applying for a 35,000 PKR loan through Kashf to buy packages of grain, sugar and rice to meet increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of successful expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy packages of grains, sugar and rice for her store.

loans.name: Vergine

texts.en:
Vergine lives in Amberd, a village in Armenia, with her husband and three children. Near the house where they live, her family owns land where they grow wheat, tomatoes, greens and cabbage. Vergine's husband sells the harvest in local markets, the profits from which are the family's main source of income.

Vergine loves her farm, so she would like to enlarge it and make it more profitable. Her requested loan of 1000 USD through SEF International will greatly assist her in buying tomato seeds and hiring workers to help her cultivate the fields. She hopes that lenders will support her with this loan.

loans.use: to pay for tomato seeds and hire workers to cultivate the fields.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem, 54, is married and deals in animal sales. She buys baby goats and calves, raises them, then sells them at market at a profit. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family’s income. She also sells milk to make extra money.

Naseem needs to improve her business in order to help cover household expenses. For this reason she contacted Kashf Foundation. She is now applying for a 40,000 PKR loan to buy more animals. This will be her fifth loan cycle, and she has established a good credit history.

Naseem is very experienced in this business and has good contacts in the market. With her loans she has definitely expanded her business and income level.

loans.use: to buy more goats and calves

loans.name: Gulkharam

texts.ru: Гулхарам мама пятерых детей. Ей 50 лет. Она жительница Яванского района Республики Таджикистан. Она вырастила пятерых детей. Муж находится в Российской Федерации на заработках. У нее трое сыновей и двое дочери. Сыновья уже взрослые. А дочерям 19 и 12 лет. Гулхарам на протяжении 10 лет занимается животноводческой деятельности. Ей с  самого детства нравилось ухаживать за животными, и она выбрала семе профессию. Гулхарам выращивает крупнорогатых скотин. Сейчас она решила расширить поголовья скота и обратиться за кредитом.
texts.en: Gulkharam is 50 years old and the mother of five children.  She lives in the Yavan region of Tajikistan and raised five kids.  Her husband lives in Russia for work.  She has three sons and two daughters - all of her sons are grown, and her daughters are 19 and 12 years old.  Gulkharam has been working in animal husbandry for 10 years.  Since her childhood she has enjoyed taking care of animals, and she chose this profession.  Gulkharam raises cows, and she has decided to ask for a loan to expand her herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for breeding

loans.name: Paz Y Bien Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Paz  y Bien” conformada por 06 socios responsables y unidos. Florinda es separada y tiene 03 hijos dependientes.  A sus 40 años Florinda  ha llegado a cumplir con algunos de sus sueños como apoyar a sus hijos con sus estudios y mantener su negocio. Actualmente cuenta con una librería en su vivienda. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de cuadernos, fólderes, lapiceros y reglas. Seguir trabajando positivamente es su mayor anhelo. El grupo “Paz y Bien”  está agradecido con los inversionistas Kiva y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Florinda es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste polo blanco.
texts.en:
This is the “Paz y Bien” group, made up of 6 responsible, united members. Florinda is separated and has 3 dependent children. At the age of 40 Florinda has been able to achieve some of her dreams, such as supporting her children with their studies and keeping her business going. Currently she has a stationery shop in her home. 

This is why she is asking for the loan to buy notebooks, folders, pens and rulers. Her main desire is to continue working positively. The "Paz y Bien" group is grateful to the Kiva lenders and they promise to continue working well. 

Florinda is the first on the left, wearing a white t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, folders, pens and rulers.

loans.name: Sakeena

texts.en: Sakeena is a 45-year-old married woman. For about 11 years she has been working as a hand embroider. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele which allows her to contribute to her home expenses. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones embellishment. This way she will be able to cater to more customers in a consistent manner. She is hoping to increase her income by targeting more customers. Sakeena is in her sixth loan cycle and has good credit history.

loans.use: to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Carmen Olivia

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer ecuatoriana de 41 años,  al momento se encuentra casada con Hugo el mismo que es un militar retirado actualmente tienen dos hijos, viven en la ciudad de Latacunga provincia de Cotopaxi, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logró terminar secundaria y luego la falta de recursos económicos lo llevó a trabajar desde muy chica para poder sustentar sus necesidades. Por cosas del destino conoció  a su esposo quien ha sido un gran hombre y un buen padre, trabajan mucho para poder sustentar sus gastos y la educación de sus hijos,  juntos tienen una buseta de recorrido estudiantil y tienen como un ingreso adicional el sueldo del esposo.
Con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio pudieron construir su casa, la misma que está ubicada en esta ciudad en el  sector mas alto de la ciudad, le falta por terminar, pero poco a poco lo están logrando, hoy solicitan un crédito para la reparación de su buseta ya que la misma les ha estado dando problemas y esto dificulta su trabajo.
Carmen y su esposo  agradecen a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Carmen is an Ecuadorian woman who is 41 years old. She is married to Hugo, who is a retired soldier. They have two children and live in the city of Latacunga in the Cotopaxi province. Thanks to her parent's efforts, she managed to finish secondary school, but then the lack of resources meant that she had to work from a very young age in order to buy necessities. As fate would have it, she met her husband who has been a great man and father. They work hard in order to pay their bills and for their children's education. Together they have a school minibus and they have her husband's salary in addition.

With a lot of effort and sacrifice, they were able to build their own house, which is located in the uppermost area of the city. It is not finished yet, but bit by bit they are getting there. Now, they are asking for a loan in order to repair their minibus since it has been having problems and it is making their work more difficult.

Carmen and her husband are grateful to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making it possible for them to grow personally and professionally.

loans.use: to repair their school minibus.

loans.name: Basheeran

texts.en: Basheeran is a 48-year-old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR which she will use to buy biscuits, rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Basheeran wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital. She is in her fifth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran is 53 years old and married. She has been doing business selling bangles for many years. She buys them from wholesale markets, then sells them at a profit to the people in her community. She has a reliable clientele and makes enough to contribute to the family's income.

Sughran has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR through Kashf to buy the latest variety of bangles in different colors and designs. This will help her to increase her sales. She is in her fourth loan cycle and has a good repayment history. She wants to expand her business so as to contribute more to her family’s income.

loans.use: to buy the latest variety of bangles in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Oykiz

texts.ru:
Ойкиз 49-летняя замужняя женщина из района Дж.Расулова города Худжанд. Она ответственная и порядочная женщина. У нее одна дочь в возрасте 19 лет и двое сыновей, им по 14 и 10 лет. Дети еще учатся, а муж работает мастером. 
Ойкиз на протяжении 10 лет занимается бизнесом в сфере продаж. У нее имеется собственный магазин, где она продает продукты питания. Она всегда обслуживает своих клиентов вежливо и качественно. Ойкиз всегда думает о расширении и развитии бизнеса. Сейчас она просит кредит, чтобы разнообразить и увеличить ассортимент продуктов в своем магазине. Таким образом она хочет увеличить семейный бюджет.
texts.en: Oykiz is married, 49 years old, and from the city of Khujand in the region of DJ.Rasulova.  She is a responsible and decent woman.  She has one 19 year old daughter and two sons, who are 14 and 10 years old.  The children are in school and her husband works as a handyman.  Oykiz has worked for 10 years in retail, and owns her own store where she sells groceries.  She serves her clients professionally and efficiently.  Oykiz is always thinking about expanding and growing her business.  She is asking for a loan to increase and diversify the products she sells in her store.  In this way, she hopes to increase the family budget.

loans.use: to buy food products for her store

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos tiene 38 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de pan francés de forma ambulante. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día lo prefieren más. Carlos desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de la vivienda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y pago de mano de obra para proceder a pavimentar el piso de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Carlos is 38 years old and works selling french bread on a street stall. He has been doing this for a long time, so he already has a lot of customers who prefer him more and more each day.

Carlos wants to improve the condition of the floor of his house, which is why he has made the decision to ask for this loan from FUSAI. The loan will be used to pay for cement, sand, gravel and labour costs so that he can proceed to pave the floor of his home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to pay for cement, sand, gravel and labour costs to pave the floor of his house.

loans.name: Violette

texts.en:
Voilette is 33 years old. She is married with four children. She sells different items in her business. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, maize flour and beans for sale. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice, maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Belin Rojel

texts.es: Belin,  tiene  37 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa, tiene 3 hijos, reside  en el municipio de Colinas, Santa Bárbara.  Belin se dedica a la ebanistería fabrica muebles de madera como ser puertas, sillas, mesas, muebles de cocina, chineros etc. Este negocio lo tiene hace  3 años en su casa, el aprendió trabajando  como empleado en otro  taller.  Ha solicitado un préstamo por 20,000 lempiras para  comprar  madera para la elaboración de muebles que tiene de encargo. Tiene como meta lograr tener un taller grande y exportar muebles fuera del país.
texts.en:
Belin is 37 years old and lives in a common-law marriage with his wife and three children. They live in the Colinas area of Santa Barbara. Belin works as carpenter making wooden furniture such as doors, chairs, tables, kitchen furniture, china cupboards etc. He has run this business from his home for three years, he learnt his trade working as an employee in another workshop. 

He has asked for a loan of 20,000 lempiras in order to buy wood to make furniture for commissions he has received. His goal is to have a large workshop and export furniture overseas.

loans.use: to buy wood to make furniture for commissions.

loans.name: Jose Ruperto

texts.es: Jose de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica  a la venta  de loroco, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, también vende de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados, Jose esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de javas de loroco por mayor así como muestra la fotografía para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y poder tener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose, who is 37 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their two children. He makes a living selling "loroco" [an edible flower native to El Salvador]. His business is based in his home and he also sells as a street vendor in various markets.

Jose is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy crates of loroco wholesale, as seen in the photo, so he can continue with his work. This is his only source of income, and he hopes to make better profits so he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy crates of "loroco" wholesale.

loans.name: Floride

texts.en: Floride is 25 years old. She sells various food and retail items. With the loan, she would like to buy more cooking oil and potatoes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to increase savings.

loans.use: to buy more cooking oil and potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchases more tie-dye, lace and wax cotton for resale.

loans.name: Asharian

texts.en:
Asharian is a 40-year-old married woman. She has been running a business of selling milk with her husband for many years. She has two cows and three buffaloes, which she uses for selling milk to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit. 

Asharian has become famous for providing good-quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her fourth loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 45,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. 

Asharian is hopeful that this loan will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: God Is Good 2 Group

texts.en:
These two women comprise the group called God is Good. They live in the same neighborhood, and both work selling cereal grains and other provisions.

Mary is the featured borrower in this group. She is 35, married and has five children. Mary has more than sixteen years of experience in sales. She starts her work day at 8:00 a.m. and ends at 8:00 p.m., so helping support the household.

The women joined Ghana ID in order to take advantage of the support it offers. Together with her colleague they are applying for a 3,700 GHS loan to buy more goods to sell and thus serve their customers better.

In the future Mary would like to have a spot in the marketplace to sell her provisions so she could increase her revenue and improve her family’s life.

loans.use: To buy more cereals and other goods to sell

loans.name: Riaz

texts.en:
Riaz is 30-year-old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to the lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of thread in different colors and packs of laces, zippers and buttons. This will create a means of increasing revenue, so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. 

She is in her second loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors and packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Ulmasoy

texts.ru: Ульмасой женщина в возрасте 66 лет. Она замужем и счастлива в браке. Ее муж пенсионер. Она с мужем и сыном в возрасте 38 лет живут в городе Худжанд. Ульмасой около 10 лет работает в торговом бизнесе, продает гигиенические и моющие средства. Ульмасой нравиться ее работа и ей приятно общаться клиентами. На сегодняшний день у нее возникли трудности с финансами, и чтобы привести больше товара и расширить ассортимент продукции ей не хватает денег, и Ульмасой обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: Ulmasoy is a 66-year-old woman. She is happily married. Her husband is retired. She, her husband their 38-year-old son live in the city of Khujand. Ulmasoy has about 10 years of experience in the trading business; she sells hygienic and cleaning products. Ulmasoy loves her job and enjoys interacting with her customers. She is currently having financial difficulties does not have sufficient funds to order more products and expand selection.  Thus, Ulmasoy has requested a loan.

loans.use: To purchase hygienic and cleaning supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy underwear, shirts, hats, basic grains, and other products for her business

loans.name: Zebonisso

texts.ru: Ее зовут Зебониссо. Ей 40 лет. Она с семьей живет на районе Яван. У ее семеро детей. Шесть дочки и один сын. Ее сын самый младший ему 3 года. Старшей дочери 20 лет.  Зебониссо как и многие жители Явана занимается животноводством, выращиванием скотин. Зебониссо нравится ее работа и к тому же ее дочки помогают ей. Она решилась обратиться за кредитом и закупить больше телят и увеличить доходность от бизнеса, потому что ее дети растут и растут семейные затраты. Все заемные деньги она вложит исключительно для купли телят и корм. Она просит поддержать ее.
texts.en: Zebonisso is 40 years old, and she and her family live in Yavan.  She has seven children - six daughters and one son.  Her son is the youngest, at 3 years old, and her oldest daughter is 20 years old.  Zebonisso, like many of the people who live in Yavan, works in animal husbandry, and raises cattle.  Zebonisso enjoys her work, and her daughters help her out.  She decided to ask for a loan to purchase more calves.  She wants to increase the income from her business because it's taking more money to raise her growing children.  The money from the loan will be used solely to buy calves and feed.  She is asking you to help her.

loans.use: to buy calves in order to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 23 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This client is 23-years old.  She lives with her family in her own home.  She has a general store that she runs out of her home.  She has had the business for many years, which has given her experience in sales and allowed her to earn the best possible income.   She is well known in her neighborhood.  She has a large clientele, as her store is well stocked.  She wants to expand the business and to make a new investment, but she needs capital.  She is requesting a loan which will allow her to buy what she needs for her store, like sweets, basic grains, cooking oils, rice, sugar, soft-drinks etc.  She is certain she will pay off the loan, which will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase what she needs for her store, like sweets, basic grains, cooking oil, rice, sugar, soft-drinks etc.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is married and the mother of two children, one of whom attends school. She earns a living by selling used clothes and has been in this business for four years. She has applied for a loan for 700,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes to sell. She works in her shop seven days a week and sells on retail basis. Her major business challenges include seasonality and theft. Her goal for the future is to own a fully- stocked boutique and also buy a plot of land and build a house. She decided to join MCDT-SACCO because it charges low interest rates. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but not to piped-in water. Her main monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Teddy

texts.en:
Teddy is married with two children, one of whom goes to school. She has a business of selling used clothes and has been in this business for four years. 

She has applied for a loan of 400,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. She generates additional income from selling piped water. She works at the market six days out of every week and sells on a retail basis.  Her major business challenges include seasonality and thieves. 

She is aspiring to become a wholesaler and also to buy a plot of land and build a house. She decided to join MCDT-SACCO because it was helping poor people to access credit without transport costs incurred. 

She resides in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more bales  of used clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more plastic bowls, buckets, plastic chairs and food containers for resale.

loans.name: Ricardo Roman

texts.es: Ricardo, tiene 41 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 3 hijos y reside  en una aldea del municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara.  El se dedica a la venta de productos de la canasta básica en una pulpería como ser, arroz, azúcar, jabón, manteca, frijoles, pan, dulces, churros, harina etc. este negocio lo tiene desde hace 10 años en su casa. El préstamo que solicita es el tercer ciclo y es por 10,000 lempiras para  comprar azúcar, manteca, carnes, productos de aseo y otros. Tiene como meta invertir ganancias en remodelar su casa y hacer otro local para el negocio.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 41 years old and lives in a cohabitating union with his partner and their three children. He lives in a village in the city of Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. He makes a living selling basic food products such as rice, sugar, soap, butter, beans, bread, candy, chips, flour, etc out of a small grocery store. He has had this business in his home for ten years. 

The loan he is requesting is his third cycle and is for 10,000 Lempiras to buy sugar, butter, meat, cleaning products and others. His goal is to invest the earnings in remodeling his home and to make another space for his business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, butter, meats, cleaning products and others to restock and sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a single mother of five children, one of whom attends school. She does not take care of additional family members. She has a pub and has been in this business for 15 years. She has applied for a loan of 1,200,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO. It will be used to buy more crates of beer, soda, jerycans of local gin, and other spirits. She generates additional income from a restaurant.

She works at the market seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include transportation, thieves, and business seasonality. She is aspiring to own a big pub and restaurant. She decided to join MCDT-SACCO because of the low interest charged. She resides in the family house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more crates of beer, soda and jerycans of local Gin.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more wax cotton to expand her business.

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо деятельная сельская женщина в возрасте 45 лет. Она уроженка района Кубадиён. Мехринисо решила начать бизнес по купле и продаже скотов. Она на деньги, высланные мужем, который находится на заработках в России, запаслась кормом для скотов и у нее осталось совсем мало средств. Мехринисо хочет за счет кредита купить трех голов молодых бычков хорошей породы. Она будет держать их у себя во дворе дома, в коровнике. Мехринисо планирует откармливать скот в течение 30-35 дней и затем продавать на скотном рынке по прибыльной цене. Ей будут помогать ее старшие дети. Она очень надеется, что кредиторы Kiva дадут ей шанс реализовать намеченные планы и открыть свой бизнес.
texts.en: Mehriniso, at 45 years old, is an active, rural woman.  She is from Qubadiyon.  Mehriniso decided to start a business buying and selling cattle.  With money that her husband sends from his work in Russia, she has stocked up on feed for cattle, but now has very little money.  Mehriniso hopes that, with a loan, she will be able to purchase three, high quality young steers.  With the help of her children, she will raise the cattle in a barn near her home, fatten them for 30-35 days, and then sell them at the cattle market for a profit.  She really hopes that a loan from Kiva will give her a chance to realize her plans and start her business.

loans.use: to buy young steers to fatten and resell

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: María Luisa junto a su esposo procrearon 3 hermosos hijos siendo el mayor de 8 añitos, su mayor anhelo es que sean hijos de bien con una buena educación para su desarrollo personal, ella se dedica a la actividad de molienda de broza para extracción de oro de este negocio María Luisa junto a su esposo mantiene a su familia. Ella solicita el crédito para invertir en broza y continuar con su negocio.
texts.en: María Luisa and her husband have three beautiful children, the oldest over 8 years old. Her greatest desire is for her children to have a good education for their own personal development. She works grinding brushwood for gold mining, and she and her husband support their family through this business. María Luisa is requesting a loan to invest in brushwood.

loans.use: to buy brushwood.

loans.name: Luz Estela

texts.es:
La socia Luz Estela continua perteneciendo al banco “AMAUTA” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú.  

La socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir adelante, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo así que la socia sale adelante.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de casacas ,chompas entre otros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Luz Estela continues to belong to the “AMUTA” communal bank in Cusco – Peru.  She continues selling men’s women’, and children’s clothing and has been doing so for some time.  Things are going well for her thanks to her dedication each day.  She wants to be able to continue working, so she can get ahead because she is a very responsible and hardworking person.

She is asking for this loan to buy frocks, sweaters, and other things.

She is grateful for this loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Izzatoy

texts.ru:
Иззатой уже два года как работает медсестрой в частном детском саду. Каждый день она осматривает детей, чтобы они не заболели или если больны то назначает им лечение. Ее общий стаж работы по профессии составляет 15 лет. 
Иззатой замужем, у нее двое детей. Она проживает со своей семьей в районе Б.Гафурова города Худжанд. Ее муж автомеханик, а дети школьники. Иззатой на сумму от кредита хочет приобрести необходимые медицинские инструменты, а также частично использовать кредит на ремонт квартиры. Она надеется, что ее поддержат. Иззатой честная и порядочная женщина. Она будет выплачивать кредит в срок.
texts.en: Izzatoy has been working for two years as a nurse in a private kindergarten. Every day, she examines the children so that they do not get sick and treats them if they are sick. She has had fifteen years of experience in her profession. Izzatoy is married and has two children. She lives with her family in the B.Gafurov area in the town of Khujand. Her husband is a mechanic, and their children attend school. Izzatoy wants to use the loan to acquire necessary medical instruments, as well as to to repair and renovate her apartment. She hopes that she will receive support. Izzatoy is an honest and decent woman. She will repay the loan on time.

loans.use: To purchase necessary medical instruments and renovate her home

loans.name: Inobat

texts.ru:
Инобат трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Ей 48 лет. Инобат с детства  приучена к труду на земле. Инобат очень любит природу, увлекается комнатными растениями. У Инобат большой дом и место хватит для всего. Она со своей семьей разводят крупнорогатых скот и еще занимаются земледелием, выращивают разных видов овощей. Каждый год с наступлением весны Инобат сажает саженцев фруктовых деревьев,  таким образом, год за годом увеличивает разновидности фруктовых деревьев. Летом, когда созревают фрукты Инобат может продать их на рынке  это еще дополнительный доход   её семье.
Вот и наступила весна, как обычно у нее дела кипят. Инобат подготавливает землю  посадки семян овощей и фруктовых деревьев. Но для покупки семян, удобрения  и фруктовых деревьев нужны денежные средства. Но в данный момент у Инобат немного финансовые затруднение. Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом.
Инобат мечтает о том, чтобы её дети и внуки жили в достатке и в благополучие, для этого они должны учиться хорошо и получить образование.
texts.en: Inobat is a hardworking and kind woman. She is 48 years old. Since childhood, Inobat has been accustomed to working the soil. Inobat loves nature and enjoys indoor plants. Inobat has a large house with enough space for everything. She and her family breed cattle and also farm different kinds of vegetable . During the early spring of each year, Inobat plants fruit tree saplings, thereby increasing the variety of fruit trees every year. In the summer, when the fruit ripens, Inobat can sell it on the market to provide extra income for her family. Now that spring has arrived, she is keeping busy as usual. Inobat is preparing the soil for planting vegetable seeds and fruit trees. However, Inobat needs money to buy seeds, fertilizers and fruit trees. At the moment, Inobat is experiencing some financial difficulties. Thus, she has turned to MDO Arvand for a loan. Inobat dreams that her children and grandchildren could live in abundance and prosperity. In order to accomplish this, they will need to study well and get an education.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more perfume, soap, body cream and lotion to sell.

loans.name: Antoinette

texts.en: Antoinette is 45 years old. She is married and the mother of ten children who range in age from two to twenty years old. She earns a living by selling various items such as cooking oil, bananas and flour. She plans to use the additional income she earns as a result of this loan to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy more cooking oil, bananas and flour to sell.

loans.name: Ameli

texts.en:
Ameli is a 28-year-old carpenter by profession who wants to repair the roofing of his family’s house. Ameli is not married yet; hence he lives with his parents and two other siblings in accordance with the rural traditions.
 
Ameli lived in Greece for about ten years, and it is there that he practiced his profession. Not only did he learn and practice carpentry, but he also learned techniques about stone/wood carving and has been practicing such skills lately, making and then selling carved items at the local market, in the city of Elbasan. 

In the background of the photograph you can see some of his artwork: a water fountain, Mother Teresa, and two pigeons.

loans.use: to repair the roofing of his family's home.

loans.name: Abduhakim

texts.ru:
Абдухаким 32-летний молодой мужчина,проживающий в городе Худжанд. Он по профессии шашлычник и уже 9 лет как занимается готовкой шашлыка. Хотя Абдухаким закончил высшее учебное заведение, но он не пошел работать по своей специальности. Закончив учебу в университете, он открыл свою шашлычницу и до сих пор продолжает заниматься этим. 
Абдухаким женат, имеет 8-летнего сына, который учится в школе. Его жена тоже работает. Вместе с ними также живет его мать. 
Абдухаким доволен своей работой. Ему нравится готовить клиентам свое фирменное блюдо "шашлык", который у него получается очень вкусно и сочно. Один раз попробовав его шашлыки вы уже становитесь его постоянным клиентом. 
Абдухаким сейчас нуждается в кредите. Он хочет приобрести большой холодильник для хранения мяса, а также купить большой стол, на котором он будет работать. Таким образом он хочет расширить свою деятельность и увеличить доходность своего дела. Свою цель он сможет реализовать только с вашей поддержкой.
texts.en: Abduhakim is a 32-year-old young man who lives in the city of Khujand. He is a kebab-maker by trade and has nine years of experience in cooking kebabs. Although Abduhakim finished college, but he did not go to work in his field. After finishing his studies at the university, he opened his kebab business has been operating it ever since. Abduhakim married and has an 8-year-old son who goes to school. His wife also works. His mother lives with them as well. Abduhakim is satisfied with his work. He likes to prepare his signature dish, "kebab", for his clients. He makes it very tasty and juicy. Once you try his kebabs, you will become his loyal customer. Now, Abduhakim now a loan. He wants to buy a large fridge to store meat, and a large table that he can work on. This way, he hopes wants to expand his business and increase its profitability. His goals can only be realized with your support.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator and work table

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима заботливая мать и любящая жена. Ее муж Солех очень рад, что женился на такой прекрасной женщине. Фотима трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она имеет свой бизнес. Фотима шьёт и продает национальные женские халаты, а также покрывала. Она вышивает очень красивые цветы. Благодаря качественной работы, она имеет постоянных клиентов. Фотима планмрует увеличить оборотный капитал и развевать бизнес. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 Сомони для покупки тканей. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Fotima is a caring mother and loving wife. Her husband Solekh is very glad that he married such a wonderful woman. Fotima is a hardworking, conscientious woman. She has her own business. Fotima sews and sells the cultural robes and veils for women. She embroiders very beautiful flowers. Thanks to her high-quality work, she has regular customers. Fotima plans to increase her working capital and grow her business. She has requested a loan of 2000 Somoni for purchasing fabrics. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabrics to increase her working capital

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia Bernardina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de granos secos, la socia vende trigo, cebada y maiz,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde puede vender los granos secos. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar maiz, trigo y cebada. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The group member Bernardina continues to make a living from the sale of dried grains. She sells wheat, barley and corn. The member has been in this business for many years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a space where she can sell the dried grains. The member is requesting this loan to buy corn, wheat and barley.

The member is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn, wheat and barley

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia Francisca se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artes y pulseras, la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los aretes y pulseras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar aretes y collares.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Francisca continues to work selling earrings and bracelets. She sells from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has had this business for several years and it is going very well for her. Her dreams is to have a shop where she can sell the earrings and bracelets. She is requesting the loan to buy earrings and necklaces. She is glad for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy earrings and necklaces.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Hello, world! Meet Jane. She comes from Eldoret, home to many Kenyan Olympic runners. She has eight children she is supporting through farming. With 30 years of experience in farming, Jane comfortably strikes a balance between dairy, poultry, and crop farming without dropping balls left, right, and centre. She sells milk, eggs, fruits, and vegetables for a living. She enjoys horticulture more than other activities. However, horticulture farming requires the sort of heavy investment Jane cannot afford. She is especially struggling with inputs.

Jane is seeking a loan from you to purchase an irrigation kit. This will solve the problems brought by long dry spells in the region. Through your loan, Jane will be able to introduce a modern technique of watering the vegetables on her farm. With the irrigation equipment, Jane is certain to realize higher yields and more income for her family.

loans.use: To purchase an irrigation kit

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es: Don Florentino, tiene  60 años de edad, esta casado, tiene  4 hijos  y  vive en una aldea del municipio de Santa Bárbara.  Toda su vida se a dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos maíz y frijoles, hace 9 años cultiva café, esta producción la vende en el mercado local.  El préstamo que solicita es por 10,000 lempiras y los va invertir en insumos y fertilizantes para  darle asistencia a la finca y pago de mano de obra. Su meta es ampliar el cultivo y tener una vida estable con su familia.
texts.en: Florentino is 60 years old. He is married with four children and lives in a small village in the municipality of Santa Bárbara. His whole life he has worked growing basic grains, corn and beans. For nine years he has been growing coffee, which he sells at the local market. The loan he is requesting is for 10,000 lempiras that he will use to invest in supplies and fertilizers to tend to his farm and to pay for labor. His goal is to expand his crop and have a stable life with his family.

loans.use: to clean and fertilize his coffee farm.
