La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia Gloria está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gloria continues to dedicate herself to her grocery store business, and she is also continuing with her restaurant business. She sells basic staple products such as rice, sugar, milk and crackers. She works from 8:00 a.m until 7:00 p.m. She has operated this business for 5 years, and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her grocery store business. She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and crackers. 

Gloria is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and crackers to sell.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosario continua con su negocio de venta de huevos  y por la noche a la venta de salchipapas,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia trabaja de forma ambulatoria ,la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio l cual le trae satisfacciones tanto  económicas como personales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para su negocio como aceite, huevos entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Rosita de Los Angeles communal bank, whose members live in San Sebastian District, Cusco province, in Cusco department. Rosario still has her business selling eggs, and at night she sells salchipapas (fried potatoes and sausage). 

She is a responsible and hard-working person who works as a street vendor. She works as a street vendor and has been in her business for some time; which brings her satisfactions, both financial and personal. She wishes to be able to continue working in this way and to continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting the loan so that she can buy supplies for her business, such as cooking oil, eggs and other items. She feels grateful for the loan granted, and promises to make her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy supplies for business such as cooking oil, eggs and other items.

loans.name: Melvin De Jesús

texts.es:
Melvin de 20 años de edad, estudio hasta 6º grado; esta acompañando; su pareja se dedica a oficios domésticos por el momento; ya que esta embarazada; no tienen hijos todavía. Nadie mas vive con él, solamente su señora quien depende de él. 

El cliente es empleado, trabaja en una ferretería, tiene cinco meses de trabajar en esa empresa. No tiene negocio propio, pero además cuenta con ayuda económica de su familia; a su trabajo viaja en bus; su horario es de 7:00am a 4:00pm.

 El cliente utilizara el dinero del préstamo, para realizar ultrasonografìas de su compañera de vida, por el embarazo. E La necesidad satisfecha es que le pueda hacer el examen a su señora y poder tener la certeza que su bebe esta muy bien dentro del vientre de su madre. Sus sueños son que su hijo pueda nacer fuerte y sano y así poder seguir trabajando para darle la mejor calidad de vida que se pueda. El préstamo le ayuda mucho ya que puede hacer sus cosas personales y de su sueldo ir pagando por cuotas, así también poder responderle muy bien a Credicampo.
texts.en:
Melvin is 20 years old, and he went to school up to the sixth grade. He has a life partner, who is currently dedicating herself to domestic tasks, since she is pregnant. This will be their first child. No one else lives with him, only his partner who depends on him. 

The borrower is an employee who works in a hardware store. He has worked for this company for five months. He does not have a business of his own, but he also has some economic support from his family. He goes to work by bus, and his work hours are from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Melvin will use the funds from the loan to pay for ultrasound exams for his life partner during her pregnancy. The need this will satisfy is that he will be able to ensure that his partner has these tests, and they can be sure that their baby is doing well within its mother's womb. His dreams are that his child will be born strong and healthy, and also that he will be able to continue working to give it the best quality of life he can. The loan will help him greatly, since he will be able to take care of personal things and pay off the loan from his salary, and thus he will be a responsible client of Credicampo.

loans.use: to pay for his life partner's ultrasound exams for her pregnancy.

loans.name: José Leonardo

texts.es:
José de 39 años de edad,  estudio hasta tercer  grado, se casó a la edad de los  20 años, a procreado tres  hijos con su pareja, su esposa es ama de casa, es gente muy humilde y trabajadora,  ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, tiene gallinas y cerdos los que engorda para posteriormente venderlos, los hijos todos van a la escuela, nadie más vive con ellos.


Él es comerciante de ganado, compra y vende,  cuando el negocio no está del todo bien se dedica a la agricultura tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseño que la vida solo se vivía bien, cuando se respeta y se hace respetar como persona que es. Cuando lo buscan que le ayude a trabajar también lo hace, ordeña 2 vacas las que le producen cuajada y leche, con lo que tiene el sustento de la casa un poco seguro. Distancia que recorre es variable, ya que no siempre va al mismo lugar, cuando saca la cosecha una parte la vende y lo demás para el gasto,  el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 am a 12:00 md. Y por la tarde se dedica al negocio del ganado.


El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar ganado de repasto, para luego venderlo y con esto genera un ingreso a su hogar, con lo que mejorara sus activos  y podrá ampliar la producción y tendrá más posibilidades para sus hijos que están estudiando.

Su deseo es que sus hijos se preparen en la educación y  poderlos sacar adelante por medio del sacrificio  que incurre tener hijos estudiando, espera que sus hijos se preparen para que un día sean el  que le ayuden  en su vejez, todo esto lo logra con la bendición de Dios y su esfuerzo. Las ganancias del comercio será invertido en el pago de la cuota y en seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
José, 39, studied until third grade. He married at the age of 20, he has procreated three children with his partner. His wife is a homemaker; they are very humble and hardworking people. She is the one who is in charge of the duties of the home. She has hens and pigs that she fattens to sell later. The children all go to school; no one else lives with them.

He is a trader of cattle; he buys and sells. When the business isn't all that good, he works in agriculture. He has been doing this activity for more than 20 years. Since he was young, his father taught him that life is only lived well when one is respectful and is respected as the person who they are. When you look for what will help him to work, he does it as well.

He milks 2 cows which produce curds and milk, with which he secures some of the livelihood of the house. The distance that he travels varies, since he doesn't always go to the same place. When he takes a harvest, he sells one part and the rest is for expenses. He does the work in the morning from 6:00 AM to 12:00 noon. In the afternoon, he works in the cattle raising business.

The loan that he is applying for is to buy cattle for grazing, to sell them later and with this generate income to his home. With this, he will improve his assets, will be able to increase production and will have more possibilities for his children who are studying.

His desire is that his children prepare themselves in an education and that they are able to get ahead, by means of the sacrifice that he incurs by having his children study. He hopes that his children prepare themselves so that one day it will be he whom they help in his old age. He will achieve all of this with the blessing of God and his strength. The profits of the business will be invested in the payment of the installments and in continuing to work.

loans.use: to buy cattle for grazing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand and pay for labor to cement in the floor of his house.

loans.name: Cristal Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CRISTAL” iniciará el décimo séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Emma es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chuño, costura de polleras, venta de ropa, venta de fruta, venta de comida, elaboración de peluches, venta de edredones.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Emma es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta verduras; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió del negocio que su prima tenia, donde ella apoyaba, posteriormente decide emprender un negocio independiente en su zona.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de verduras por mayor) que adquirirá de las tiendas distribuidoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo implementará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada  y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones en salud y crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The comunal bank "Cristal" [Crystal], as part of the Collpani regional office, is entering its 17th cycle with Pro Mujer. It is made up of eight members and lead by a board of directors with Emma as the president. The businesses ran by the members of the community bank are varied and include: sewing traditional Andean skirts, making stuffed animals and the sale of chuño (freeze dried potato), clothes, fruit, food and traditional quilts.

The loan they will take out will benefit small micro-entrepreneurs, including Emma. She has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years since a member of the organization arrived at her home and invited her to join. Nowadays, Emma has a business selling vegetables which she learned from a cousin who previously ran the business where she helped out. She subsequently decided to start a business in her own area. 

The loan she will take out is to increase her capital (to buy vegetables wholesale) which she will acquire from the retail stores in the city of El Alto and subsequently bring to her sales area. This type of work allows her to generate income for her family since she is married with five children. 

When asked what it is that she likes about Pro Mujer, Emma responds that she likes the training sessions in health and lending which the organization offers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Oimkhol

texts.ru: Оимхол 50 летняя жительница района Кубадиён. Она жена и мама. Муж Оимхол с сыном работают в Российской Федерации. Из-за отсутствия рабочих мест в родных краях они уехали на заработки. Оимхол в Кубадиёна занималась животноводством. У нее есть три скотины. Оимхол на протяжении многих лет держала скотном дворе скотин. За столь время она набралась немало опыта и навыков в деятельности животноводства и хочет все свои знания в этой области вложит в бизнес. Она начнет бизнес в сфере купли продажи крупнорогатых скотин. Оимхол будет закупать их с рынка района Шахритус и после откорма перепродать их с наценкой, но для начала данного бизнеса ей необходимы средства на которые она купит скотин. Она решила взять кредит и начать бизнес.
texts.en: Oimkhol is a 50 year old resident of the Qubadiyon district. She is married and a mother. Oimkhol's husband works with their son in Russia. They left to work abroad because of the lack of jobs in their homeland. Oimkhol raises livestock in Qubadiyon. She has three animals. She has kept livestock in their farm yard for many years. Over time she has collected skill and experience in animal husbandry, and she'd like to apply her knowledge in this area to a business. She is starting her business in the buying and selling of cattle. Oimkhol will buy them at the Sharituz district market, and after fattening them, re-sell for a profit. To start this business she must have the funds to buy the animals. She decided to take out a loan and begin the business.

loans.use: To buy livestock in order to start an animal husbandry business

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
La socia Dominga se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, la socia lleva a diferentes lugares, la socia vende platanos, naranjas y manzanas y también vende cebollas, tomates y zapallos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar naranjas, plátanos y uvas y compara verduras como cebollas, zanahorias y tomates. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Dominga continues to work in her business selling fruits and vegetables, which she takes to various locations. She sells bananas, oranges and apples, and also sells onions, tomatoes and squash. She has had her business for several years now, and it is going very well.

Her dream is to have a permanent location where she can sell the fruits and vegetables. She is requesting the loan to buy bananas and grapes, as well as vegetables such as onions, carrots and tomatoes.

The member is happy about the loan, and promises to make her installment payments.

loans.use: To buy oranges, bananas and grapes, as well as vegetables such as onions, carrots and tomatoes.

loans.name: Bella Rosa

texts.en:
Bella Rosa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to purchase stock like canned goods, sugar, soap, shampoo, snack foods, etc. to sell for her general store business.

Bella Rosa has been in this business for 10 years. She earns more income from farming rice.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she is requesting an additional loan to further build her business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase stock like canned goods, sugar, soap, shampoo, snack foods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Erick Alberto

texts.es:
Erick tiene 33 años de edad,  él no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar por falta de recursos economicos esta acompalñado tiene dos hijos, su compañera de vida es ama de casa, se dedica a cuidar sus niños, es agricultor ya tiene doce alios de dedicarse a esto, a su señora su padre desde muy joven le enseño, este trabajo siendo este trabajo su subsistencia.

Él viaja a su lugar de trabajo todos los dias, necesita el dienro para ocmprar insumos agricolas, es decir preparar la tierra,  abono, semilla de sandia, insecticidas y hervicidas con esto se le hara mas facil terminar el cultivo, para una mejor producción, pues a traves, de su trabajo, espera superarse tener una buena cosecha para darle una mejor vida a sus hijos y  cuando sean grandes sean unas personas de bien y profesionales.
texts.en:
Erick is 33 years old. He had no opportunity to study due to lack of economic resources. He has a partner and two children. His life partner is a housewife, who looks after their children. Erick is a farmer and has been for twelve years. When he was very young, his father taught him his job, which provides his livelihood.

He travels to his workplace every day. He needs the money to buy agricultural supplies: to prepare the land, fertilizer, watermelon seed, insecticides and herbicides. These will make it easier to cultivate his crops for better production because through his work he expects a better harvest. He can then give a better life to his children and when they grow up they can become respectable people with professions.

loans.use: to prepare the ground, buy fertilizer, watermelon seed, insecticides and herbicides and thus make it easier for him to finish cultivation

loans.name: Ernesto Isaias

texts.es:
Ernesto de 23 años de edad, es bachiller; esta casado, su esposa se dedica a oficios domésticos; tiene una hija de 4 ½ meses. Nadie mas vive con él y solamente 2 personas dependen de el. El cliente es empleado; tiene alrededor de 2 años de ser empleado, él no tiene ningún negocio. La distancia donde trabaja esta como a 8 km de su casa y viaja en bus; su horario de trabajo es de 4 días seguidos y 3 de descanso. 

El cliente comprara madera para terminar la construcción de su vivienda y además ponerle el servicio básico de energía eléctrica. El préstamo le mejorara su calidad de vida, ya que podrá tener su propia vivienda. Sus sueños son poder seguir trabajando para tener una vivienda digna para su familia; en cuanto a su hija, que crezca fuerte y sana. El préstamo le ayudara mucho ya que puede trabajar en su casa hasta terminarla; de su sueldo de empleado va pagando su préstamo y espera responder muy bien para que Credicampo le siga prestando.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 23 years old, a high school graduate and married. His wife looks after the home and they have a 4 1/2 month--old daughter. No one else lives with him and just two people depend on him. He is employed and has been for about two years. He has no business. The area where he works is around 8 km from his home and he travels by bus. His work hours are four days on, three days off.

The client will buy wood for completing the construction of his home, and will also install basic electricity service. The loan will improve his quality of life, as he will be able to have his own home. 

His dreams are to be able to continue working so that he can have a decent home for his family, and for his daughter to grow up strong and healthy.

A loan will help him greatly, as he can work on his home until he finishes it. From his salary as an employee he is paying off his loan little by little, and expects to meet his obligations very well, so that CrediCampo will keep lending to him.

loans.use: To buy wood and install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramon es un hombre de 29 años de edad, el es soltero y tiene un hijo de cinco años de edad, actualmente viven en el Departamento de Suchitepequez.
El es un hombre trabajador que lucha por el bienestar de su familia. El comenta que trabaja en una maquila en la ciudad capital. Eligió esta actividad ya que sus amigos le comentaron que había una oportunidad de trabajo, es como de esta manera el obtuvo este trabajo, que le ha ayudado a contribuir con la economía de su familia. También se dedica al cultivo de frijoles y ejotes. 
Ahora él ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo de Q 3,000.00 para la compra de materiales tales como lámina y madera, que servirá para la mejora de su vivienda. El préstamo lo pagara con el trabajo que actualmente tiene.
Uno de sus sueños es terminar las mejoras de su vivienda, para que en un futuro su familia viva en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Ramon is a 29-year-old man. He is single and has a five-year-old son. They currently live in the Department of Suchitepequez.

He is a hard-working man who is striving for his family's well-being. He comments that he works in a factory in the capital city. He chose this work because his friends told him there was a job opportunity there, and in this way he got the job. This has helped him contribute to his family's economic support. He also works growing beans and corn. 

He has now made the decision to request a loan of Q 3,000.00 to buy materials such as wood and metal sheets, which he will use to improve his home. He will pay off the loan from the job that he has. 

One of his dreams is to finish improving his home, so that in the future his family will live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials such as wood and metal plates to improve his home.

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
Corina: Es una señora cordial, tiene 52 años de edad, casada con 4 hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Desde hace 25 años estableció su pequeño negocio de venta de chiverías, fritos y refrescos naturales, que los ofrece en termo con hielo y para cubrirse del sol utiliza plástico negro como techo. Con el propósito de incrementar su inventario, ha coordinado el grupo primavera integrado por 3 mujeres que se dedican a vender golosinas en las afueras de un colegio público. Solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería para su negocio: caramelos, galletas, chiverias, pilipitas, pollo, repollo, tomate, azúcar y frutas para elaborar lo frescos. Su sueño es tener una pulpería en su vivienda.

Victoria: Tiene 21 años de edad, casada con 2 hijos, el mayor de 6 años cursa su primer grado de primaria y un menor de edad. Su esposo se encuentra desempleado. Desde hace 4 años estableció su pequeño negocio de venta de chiverías, fritos y refrescos naturales en un colegio público. Solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio.

Ermicenda: Está casada tiene 6 hijos, mayores de edad e independientes. Desde hace 10 años estableció su pequeño negocio de venta de chiverías, fritos y refrescos naturales en un colegio público. Solicita financiamiento para comprar mercadería. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Corina is a friendly person. She is 52, married and has 4 grown-up, independent children. She set up her small business 25 years ago selling Chivería brand products, deep-fried snacks and natural fruit drinks, which she provides from a thermos with ice and which she protects from the sun using a sheet of black plastic as a roof. In order to increase their inventory, she set up the Primavera Group, made up of 3 women who sell snacks outside a public school. She is asking for a loan to buy stock for her business including sweets, biscuits, Chivería brand products, pilipitas (a type of banana), chicken, cabbage, tomatoes, sugar and fruit to make into drinks. Her dream is to have a small grocery store in her home.

Victoria is 21, married and has 2 children. The oldest is 6 and is in first grade at primary school. and the younger child is a minor. Her husband is out of work. She set up her small business 4 years ago selling Chivería brand products, deep-fried snacks and natural fruit drinks at a public school. She is asking for a loan to buy goods. Her dream is to expand her business.

Ermicenda is married and has 6 grown-up, independent children. She set up her small business 10 years ago selling Chivería brand products, deep-fried snacks and natural fruit drinks at a public school. She is asking for a loan to buy produce. Her dream is to scale up her business.

loans.use: to buy goods for her business.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
EL socio pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Ronald continua con su negocio de servicio de vulcanizadora, él socio continua con su negocio realizando arreglos, reparaciones entre otros para los distintos clientes que solicitan sus servicios, el socio lleva buen tiempo en el negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales,siendo de esta forma que el socio sale adelante.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de aceites, herramientas entre otros.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Rosita de Los Angeles communal bank,whose members live in San Sebastian district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Ronald still has his tire business, doing repairs and other things for the various clients who request to services. He has been in this business for some time, and it brings him both personal and financial satisfactions, as this way he is moving forward in life. 

He is requesting the loan in order to buy oil, tools and other items. He feels grateful for the loan granted, and promises to make his installment payments.

loans.use: To buy oil, tools and other items.

loans.name: 14 - Quảng Thành Group

texts.en:
Hoàn is applying for a loan to improve her business. She operates a food stall, selling vegetables.

Hoàn is 39 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the 13.03.14 - Quảng Thành solidarity group, which consists of five members. Hoàn lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hoàn's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Hoàn faces in her business is lack of capital.

With her business profits, Hoàn hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to improve her business of selling vegetables.

loans.name: Bernalda

texts.en:
Bernalda is 57 years old and married with ten children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Bernalda is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business.

Bernalda has been raising livestock for two years and also earns additional income from buying and selling bananas and running a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business.
